title: RPA Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing RPA solutions to streamline business processes, increase efficiency, and reduce operational costs across our organization.

Key Responsibilities
- Analyze existing business processes and identify opportunities for automation
- Design and develop RPA solutions using tools such as UiPath, Blue Prism, or Automation Anywhere
- Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications
- Create process definition documents (PDDs) and solution design documents (SDDs)
- Develop, test, and deploy RPA bots to automate repetitive tasks and workflows
- Ensure the quality and performance of RPA solutions through thorough testing and debugging
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for implemented RPA solutions
- Stay updated on the latest RPA technologies and best practices
- Train and mentor junior team members on RPA development and best practices
- Monitor and optimize the performance of RPA bots and processes
- Collaborate with IT teams to ensure proper integration of RPA solutions with existing systems

Qualifications
- 2-3+ years of experience in RPA development and implementation
- Strong proficiency in at least one major RPA platform (UiPath, Blue Prism, or Automation Anywhere)
- Experience with process analysis and optimization
- Solid understanding of business process management concepts
- Familiarity with programming languages such as VB.NET, C#, or Python
- Knowledge of SQL and database management systems
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Preferred Qualifications
- RPA certifications (e.g., UiPath Certified Professional, Blue Prism Developer, Automation Anywhere Certified Advanced RPA Professional)
- Experience with process mining tools
- Knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies

Benefits:

-PTO (Vacation Leave) that increases every year that you are with us
-Separate PTO for Sick Leave
-Maternity and Paternity Leave
-Bereavement Leave
-Evaluation and opportunity for raises every 4 months from start date.
-Opportunity! All our positions have multi-tiered levels so you can get promoted in a matter of months. You get a detailed breakdown of what the qualifications are for every position and their respected levels, as well as the requirements and responsibilities that come with them.

title: Business Metrics & Sales Tracker Specialst
description:
We are looking for a meticulous Business Metrics & Sales Tracker Specialist to create and manage comprehensive tracking systems (Excel, Google Sheets, etc.) for all essential business metrics.

*Key Responsibilities:*

- *Data Tracking:* Design and manage an organized and efficient system to track key business and sales metrics.
- *Reporting:* Compile weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports for performance reviews.
- *Analysis:* Provide insights and recommendations based on the data collected.
- *Automation:* Implement and optimize automated tracking and reporting processes where possible.
- *Metrics Management:* Track and report on specific metrics including:
- Number of booked calls per week
- Number of show-ups
- Number of closed deals
- Cash collection
- Monthly revenue
- Expenses tracking
- Number of cancellations
- Retention rate
- Churn rate

*Requirements:*

- *Experience:* Proven experience in creating and managing detailed tracking systems using Excel, Google Sheets, or similar tools.
- *Skills:* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in data visualization and report generation.
- *Detail-Oriented:* Exceptional attention to detail to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
- *Communication:* Strong written and verbal communication skills for clear reporting and documentation.
- *Qualifications:* Relevant qualifications in business, analytics, or a related field are preferred.

*Do Not Apply If:*

- You lack substantial experience in creating and managing complex tracking systems.
- You are not comfortable working with extensive data sets.
- You cannot deliver precise and detailed reports on a regular basis.

title: Cold Email Expert | $6 USD
description:
To apply:

Please send your resume and a short video introduction (1-2 minutes) explaining your experience with cold email campaigns, including details of any tools you've used and results you've achieved. Only applicants who submit both a resume and a video introduction will be considered for an interview.

Job Title:

Cold Email Marketing Expert (Remote)
Location: Philippines (Remote)
Salary: $6 USD per hour
Hours: Full-time, 40 hours per week
Work Schedule: US Business Hours (Night Shift in the Philippines)

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced Cold Email Marketing Expert to join our team and lead the development of a comprehensive cold email outreach campaign. This is a remote position, and we are specifically seeking candidates based in the Philippines.

The ideal candidate must have a proven track record in cold email marketing, including designing, building, and executing cold email campaigns from the ground up. You will be responsible for creating strategies that convert leads into customers through personalized, targeted outreach. You should also be proficient in writing compelling email copy, handling data lists, using automation tools, and tracking campaign performance.

Responsibilities:

Design, build, and implement effective cold email marketing campaigns aimed at generating leads and driving conversions.
Develop email templates and sequences that are personalized, engaging, and tailored to specific audiences.
Conduct A/B testing to optimize subject lines, email copy, and calls-to-action (CTAs).
Research and develop targeted lead lists and ensure email lists are accurate and up-to-date.
Use email automation software to schedule, manage, and track email campaigns.
Ensure compliance with email marketing regulations, including CAN-SPAM and GDPR (where applicable).
Monitor deliverability rates, open rates, click-through rates (CTR), and conversion rates to assess performance.
Make data-driven decisions to continuously improve campaign performance and effectiveness.
Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to align strategies and achieve business goals.
Stay updated with the latest cold email marketing trends, tools, and best practices.

Requirements:

Proven experience in cold email marketing and lead generation.
Strong understanding of email marketing tools such as Mailchimp, Sendinblue, ActiveCampaign, or similar platforms.
Experience with email automation and tracking software.
Exceptional ability to write persuasive, engaging email copy that drives action.
Ability to analyze campaign data and make informed adjustments to improve results.
Knowledge of email marketing regulations (CAN-SPAM, GDPR, etc.).
Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a remote environment.
Experience working remotely for international clients is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:

Prior experience working with B2B or B2C cold email campaigns.
Background in sales or marketing.
Familiarity with tools like Hunter.io, Lemlist, Snov.io, or other lead generation tools.
Knowledge of customer relationship management (CRM) tools like HubSpot or Salesforce.

Benefits:

Competitive hourly rate of $6 USD.
Opportunity to work remotely from anywhere in the Philippines.
Long-term, stable position with room for growth and skill development.
Work with an international team and gain valuable experience in the industry.
Application Instructions:

Submit your resume and a video introduction to explain your experience with cold email marketing.

title: GHL Analyst
description:
GHL Analyst
Position Description

GHL Analyst (Work From Home)
Digital Marketing Agency for Dentists

A GHL Analyst career with us means a career where you are actively transforming the way our business operates through technology, data, and process optimization via levering GHL platform and emerging technologies. You will help build the most exclusive dental marketing agency and technology company in the world.

About Us:

SaaS Global is a Digital Marketing Agency and CRM Software provider. Our Vision is to be the most exclusive Dental Marketing Agency in the World. Our Brand Promise is Dental Marketing with Heart. Our Common Purpose is to Co-Create Smiles. We are based in APAC, have been in business for 12 years and have a team of 30+. Our niche is dentistry. We double the revenue of dental practices in 3 years or less and many of our clients have been with us for 10+ years. We are seeking people who want to be part of something better.

Who You Are:

You are passionate AND care about seeing our customers' successfully grow patient numbers and revenue. You love making things work faster, smarter, leaner. You crave learning new things, training and implementing your ideas. You are comfortable self-teaching yourself new technologies. You are detailed, meticulous, a perfectionist and your goal is to have our business 100% automated. This is your baby. 

Position Overview:

As a GHL Analyst, you will play a critical role in optimizing our CRM and marketing automation platform - Dcrm - Dental CRM. Your deep understanding of Go High Level will enable you to streamline processes, analyse data, and provide actionable insights that will drive our marketing strategies. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a dynamic environment and is passionate about leveraging technology to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. 

We are a growing company, and it is highly likely your mindset and skill set will see you apart from other applicants in your field. 

You will relish the opportunity for leading digital transformation initiatives that improve business processes, enhance team productivity, and elevate client service. 

You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas for digital innovation and implement solutions that drive measurable improvements. You will manage the integration of new technologies, automation tools, and data-driven processes to optimize operational efficiency. The GHL platform can revolutionise the way we run our business, and you will be at the intersection of all matters pertaining to Process Improvement, Technology & Automation, Data Analysis & Reporting and Change Management. 

This is a senior role of our leadership team. 

Key Responsibilities:

Platform Optimization: Configure and optimize the Go High Level platform to meet the unique needs of our clients and internal teams.
Data Analysis: Analyse marketing and sales data within Go High Level to identify trends, measure performance, and make data-driven recommendations.
Automation Development: Develop and implement marketing automation workflows, including lead nurturing sequences, appointment setting, and follow-up campaigns.
Training & Support: Provide training and ongoing support to team members and clients to ensure they are maximizing the platform's capabilities.
Reporting: Create and maintain dashboards and reports that provide clear visibility into campaign performance, customer journeys, and ROI.
Process Improvement: Continuously assess and improve CRM processes, ensuring they align with best practices and contribute to overall business goals.

Qualifications:

Experience: 2+ years of experience working with Go High Level (requirement)Technical Skills: Proficient in data analysis, workflow automation, and CRM configuration.
Analytical Mindset: Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
Problem-Solving: Ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to simplify complex concepts for diverse audiences.
Team Player: Collaborative mindset, with a passion for helping others succeed.

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):

Transformation Impact: Success rate of digital transformation initiatives and their measurable impact on operations - goal is 96% automation. 
Process Efficiency: Massive reduction in time and resources required for key processes. 
Technology Adoption: Rate of adoption and integration and usage of new tools and technologies. 
Team Productivity: Improvement in team performance and project delivery times. 
Client Satisfaction: Feedback and satisfaction scores from clients and accelerate client growth.

Discover an Exceptional Opportunity:

Whilst we are a small business, we are very intentional in everything we do. We will be the most exclusive Dental Marketing Agency in the world. We will grow our People and our Contributions to society as a team. We Value innovation, world class delivery, connection, impact, heart and contribution. Our Keys that drive our thinking are trust, ease, care, excellence, magic and efficiency (in this order).

At the heart of our business is a commitment to our Values and Keys. We believe that everyone should love coming to work and truly be a part of something exceptional, where your contributions go beyond just fulfilling job duties. Here, you're not just staff; you're a respected member of our collaborative team. We thrive on ownership, allowing you the freedom to innovate and take charge of your projects, and driving excellence in everything we do.

In our workplace we ensure:

- Respect and Recognition: Be a valued team member in an environment that listens, appreciates, and acknowledges your unique contributions.
- Tools for Success: We provide the necessary tools and equipment, ensuring you have what you need to excel.
- Support for Your Well-being: Your health and well-being are paramount. Feel comfortable taking time off when you need to rest, recover, or simply take a break.
- Growth and Development: Expect regular, constructive discussions about your performance and career aspirations, supporting your growth every step of the way.
- Inclusivity and Fun: Join a workplace that is not only equitable and challenging but also welcoming and engaging. We celebrate diversity, encourage creativity, and believe that every day should include moments of joy and fun.

Next Steps:

If you know this is the role for you, here are the steps to connect with us:

1. Send us your CV
2. Send 5 reasons why we should hire you. 
Looking forward to connecting with you soon!

Liza

title: Senior IT Specialist
Webflow Web Designer & Developer
description:
As a Web Designer & Developer for Webflow, your main responsibilities will be creating and managing websites. We have a rapidly growing business and are developing more within our home improvement service. All of these require skilled writing to maintain and grow.

### **Web Design:**

- Collaborate with the team to design Low-Fi and High-Fi prototypes for GorbMedia clients.
- Improve and provide suggestions for better UX and UI designs.
- Create visually appealing and user-friendly layouts.
- Ensure the website is responsive and compliant across mobile, tablet, and desktop formats.
- Integrate relevant content and media in collaboration with the marketing and content teams.
- Conduct user research and testing to refine design solutions.

### **Web Development:**

- Develop and implement website features using Webflow, including new pages, components, and functionality.
- Ensure website performance and security by applying best practices in development.
- Upload videos and write/add informative content as required.
- Create and maintain internal tools and automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
- Perform cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent performance.

### **Website Technical SEO:**

- Publish SEO-optimized websites, focusing on:
- Alt text for images
- Page speed optimization
- Proper page structure and headings
- Image compression
- Canonical tags
- Configuration of robots.txt file
- XML sitemaps
- Page indexing

title: On-Demand Staffing Support and Operations Specialist
description:
We're currently looking to hire an Operations Specialist for an on-demand hospitality staffing startup. This role demands someone who can juggle multiple tasks, think ahead, and tackle high-level problem-solving with an incredible eye for detail. If you love taking notes and keeping everyone updated, this is the job for you. You’ll need to use the tools to spot and fix issues before they arise and be able to switch smoothly between onboarding, support, and daily operations.

You’ll be owning day-to-day staffing needs on a shift-by-shift basis while delivering top-notch service and support to both the workers filling the shifts and the clients who need the shifts filled. You'll collaborate closely with the core operations team to ensure a seamless staffing marketplace experience and will own the success of the business on a daily basis. Ready to make an impact? Apply Now!

Responsibilities:
- Filling multiple shifts in real-time so they’re filled on an hourly basis each day by requesting for more workers, working with the clients, and answering last minute support questions.
- Supporting workers and addressing their needs so that they can fill the shifts they’ve been assigned.
- Collaborating with other internal operations team members for process improvement.
- Managing large worker cohorts with bulk-communication tools.
- Analyzing and enhancing workflows as you learn to fully take on the role.
- Processing worker payments and managing certifications/documents.
- Ensuring excellent customer experience through effective communication.
- Being enthusiastic and advocating for marketplace workers and hospitality.

Requirements:
- 5+ years in BPO Customer Support/Onboarding experience with a US-based business, preferably a startup
- 1+ years WFH experience working directly with US-based clients
- Team Lead or Subject Matter Expert experience preferred.
- Comfort with asking lots of questions as a way to learn and understand the role
- Ability to be trained quickly and to productively receive feedback on how to improve along the way.
- Strong writing, communication, and collaboration skills in a fast-paced environment.
- A love of taking notes and keeping everyone updated on tasks.
- Ability to switch between onboarding, support, and daily operations with ease.
- Attention to detail and interest/experience in HR, staffing, hospitality, or marketplaces.
- Proven operations experience in a role where you’ve consistently taken on more responsibility.
- Proficiency in English, multitasking, and using internal tools/CRMs.
- Experience with automation tools is a huge plus (Zapier, Airtable, Make, etc.).
- Available on weekends (this business is the busiest on the weekends).

Salary and Benefits:
- Base salary: 40k PHP per month.
- Paid Time Off + Paid Holidays.
- 100% WFH.
- Flexible work arrangements and supportive team environment.

When applying, please tell us about a time when you worked in a role that involved managing staffing, supporting customers, onboarding team members, or anything you've done in HR. Also, copy and paste this Job ID: rec2TgzRiQyKxOjt6 into your email response, along with this message: “I’m excited to be applying to Job #rec2TgzRiQyKxOjt6!” This will let us know what job you’re applying for as well as show us that you actually read this entire job description (attention to detail is everything). Thanks and hope to hear from you soon!

title: Sales Closer (JOB ID:DNLVA)
description:
Job Title : Sales Closer
Job ID DNLVA
Location : Salt Lake City, Utah (Mountain Time) | Remote
Hours Flexible 5-6 hour window between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM MT
Pay rate : $300-$400/month | Commission: 10-20% on closed deals 
Residual Commission: 2-5%

Job Summary: A leading marketing agency specializing in services for life insurance agents, is seeking an experienced Sales Closer. This role is ideal for driven individuals with a proven track record in sales, particularly in closing deals over the phone. The Sales Closer will focus on making outbound calls to qualified leads, understanding their needs, overcoming objections, and closing sales on the same day.

Key Responsibilities:
Make outbound calls to qualified life insurance agents and prospects.
Conduct introduction and demo calls to present GoHighLevel (GHL) digital marketing services.
Listen attentively to customers to identify pain points and offer tailored solutions.
Effectively overcome common objections and close sales within a single call.
Schedule and conduct 30-minute Zoom meetings for product demonstrations as needed.
Follow up with leads via GHL’s email and text automation tools.
Achieve a target of closing at least one deal per day.
Maintain accurate records of calls, sales, and follow-up activities in the CRM.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in sales, particularly in closing deals over the meeting/call.
Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written.
Strong ability to listen, identify pain points, and address customer objections.
Experience with GoHighLevel (GHL) or similar CRM tools is preferred.
Previous commission-based sales experience with a strong track record.
Ability to work independently and meet sales targets consistently.
High level of professionalism, persistence, and motivation.

Performance Expectations:
The first 30 days will be considered a ramp-up period, with training provided for the first three days.
If targets are not met within the first 30 days, a performance improvement plan will be implemented.
Continuous assessment and feedback will be provided to ensure success in the role.

title: PHP Full-Stack Developer - Philippines
description:
About Dog and Rooster

Dog and Rooster is a full-service digital agency that creates beautiful, effective, and engaging digital experiences. We work with a diverse range of clients, from small businesses to large enterprises, helping them achieve their goals through our expertise in website design and development, digital marketing, and branding.


We are a team of passionate and talented professionals who strive to deliver exceptional results to our clients. Our culture is built on collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning, and we believe in fostering a fun and positive work environment where everyone can thrive.


Job Description

We are seeking a talented and experienced PHP Full-Stack Developer with a strong background in Laravel and mid to senior-level expertise in WordPress. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing, maintaining, and optimizing web applications and websites. This role requires a deep understanding of back-end and front-end technologies, as well as the ability to work effectively within a team.


Key Responsibilities

Develop, test, and maintain web applications using PHP and Laravel framework.
Design and implement new features and functionality for both custom-built applications and WordPress websites.
Collaborate with designers, project managers, and other developers to ensure high-quality and timely delivery of projects.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues and bugs.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Ensure code quality and maintainability through best practices, including code reviews and testing.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.


Qualifications

Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of professional experience in PHP development.
Laravel: Strong proficiency in Laravel, with hands-on experience in developing and maintaining Laravel-based applications.
WordPress: Solid experience with WordPress, including theme and plugin development, customization, and optimization.
Front-End: Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and frameworks/libraries like Vue.js, React, or Angular.
Database: Experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and familiarity with database design and optimization.
Version Control: Proficient in using Git for version control and collaboration.
APIs: Experience in developing and consuming RESTful APIs.
Testing: Knowledge of automated testing tools and practices.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Team Player: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


Preferred Skills

Experience with WooCommerce and other e-commerce platforms.
Knowledge of SEO best practices and performance optimization.
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and third-party integrations.
Familiarity with headless CMS and decoupled architecture.
Experience with advanced performance and security optimization techniques.
Basic understanding of graphic design and image editing tools (e.g., Photoshop, Figma).

title: Home-based Healthcare Specialist Customer Support (Immediate Hire)
description:
Are you excited about being part of something amazing in the healthcare field? If you have a passion for physical therapy, diet, and nutrition, we have an incredible opportunity for you to join our team as a Healthcare Specialist in Customer Support!

We are searching for a dedicated and caring Healthcare Specialist to join our team. As a Healthcare Specialist, you will play a vital role in providing support and guidance to our valued customers, ensuring their needs are met with patience, empathy, and accurate information.

As an essential member of our team, you will be instrumental in evaluating our healthcare programs, developing innovative educational initiatives, and ensuring the delivery of exceptional services to our valued customers. Your friendly and approachable demeanor will be crucial in building positive relationships with our customers, ensuring their satisfaction and well-being.

#

Who are we?

We are RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., and we've been around since 1999. We're always growing our team, and we've had the pleasure of offering sustainable employment opportunities to many virtual assistants over the years. Our main virtual assistant has been with us for over a decade, which really shows how we value long-term relationships. Right now, we have a team of over 90 full-time virtual assistants who are all dedicated to what they do.

We're on the lookout for someone who's independent, resourceful, and able to problem-solve. You'll need to be adaptable and open to new ideas, as well as someone who can work without constant supervision.

This job requires flexibility in terms of working hours, and you'll need to be open to working om rotational shifts. We use a time-tracking tool called Hubstaff to ensure accountability and productivity. This tool lets us monitor your working hours, capture your computer screen during work, measure your productivity, and keep track of the websites you visit while on duty.

#

What is it like working with us?

At RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., we believe in progress and constant development. You won't be doing the same old thing day in and day out for years on end. We will give you a chance to try new things and expand your horizons, which will benefit both you and the company.

Additionally, we place a high premium on fairness, honesty, and integrity in the workplace. We foster an environment where everyone is encouraged to speak up and share their ideas for growth and improvement.

#

Skills and Requirements:
- Degree in Medicine, Medical Science, Nursing, Physical Therapy/Physiotherapy, or equivalent.
- Minimum of two years of relevant experience as a Health Care Specialist.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
- Effective verbal and written communication skills in English, with attention to grammar.
- Tech-savvy with a reliable working PC, stable internet connection, and noise-canceling headset.
- Punctuality and commitment to maintaining a consistent attendance record.
- Positive working attitude and ability to maintain professionalism at all times.
- Strong work ethic, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to maintain the confidentiality of critical information.
- Teamwork and collaboration skills.
- Ability to ensure brand consistency and accuracy in all tasks.
- Comfortable working with a time-tracking tool to manage work hours effectively.

#

Duties and Responsibilities:
- Respond to inquiries, concerns, and requests from customers regarding healthcare services and products.
- Address and resolve customer complaints or issues, ensuring a satisfactory resolution.
- Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions and follow-up actions taken.
- Collaborate with healthcare professionals and internal teams to ensure a seamless and positive customer experience.
- Continuously improve customer support processes and contribute to enhancing the overall customer experience.
- Provide guidance and educational resources to customers, helping them make informed decisions about their healthcare.
- Develop written procedures for the company's current processes and procedures.

#

How to apply for this position?

To apply, simply send an email to hiringmanager@ExercisesForInjuries.net .

Use this subject line: Full-Time Health Care Specialist Customer Support (Work From Home) - Application

To ensure a comprehensive review of your application, please provide the following information:

1.) Attached Resume: Please attach a clear and updated copy of your resume. Ensure that it includes your recent photo.

2.) Character References: Please provide the names, contact numbers, and email addresses of three character references who can speak to your professional skills and work ethic.

3.) Onlinejobs.ph Account: Please provide the link to your Onlinejobs.ph account.

4.) Employment Status: Are you currently employed? Please let us know your current employment status.

5.) Interview Availability: Are you available to be interviewed at any time? Please inform us of your availability for interviews.

6.) Salary Expectation: Please state your salary expectation for this position.

7.) Certifications: If you hold any certifications or credentials relevant to the healthcare field, please provide a link to them for our review.

Note that we only accept applications through email, and we appreciate your adherence to these instructions.

We look forward to reviewing your application thoroughly and potentially having the opportunity to connect with you. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.

Best regards,

~ EFI Hiring Manager

title: Allround: Product Researcher & Lister
description:
Are you an experienced product researcher with a keen eye for trends and a talent for strategic writing? Then we are looking for you!

As a Part-time Product Researcher & Product Lister, you will be responsible for identifying profitable products through ad libraries on platforms like Facebook, TikTok, and Pinterest. You will use your expertise to create complete and compelling product descriptions, which you will then translate into German. While you will collaborate closely with our team, you are also capable of working independently.

Experience in product research using ad libraries from Facebook, TikTok, and/or Pinterest.

Fluency in English, both spoken and written.
Excellent command of the German language for translations.

Apply now and show us that you are the perfect candidate for this challenging and versatile role!

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:

title: Customer Service *Email Support Only*
description:
Do you love putting a smile on people's faces or hearing "you just made my day"?

Love connecting with our customers and fans of a holistic beauty creator with 2 million+ followers?

Do you want to be part of a fast-growing company and collaborate with the brightest, most talented minds?

Then this might be your dream job.

Before you read on, this is NOT a typical customer support job where you just copy paste standard responses or choose a canned response from the help desk software...if that's what you are looking for then you should stop reading right now, because this job is NOT for you.

We are looking for a Customer Service Specialist to help create an amazing customer experience that turns customers into raving fans.

From the moment a person clicks "Follow" or joins our community, the customer needs to feel like she has a special friend who is there to help and support her along the way....and that's exactly your job as a Customer Service Specialist.

As our Customer Service Specialist, you’re the essence of an extraordinary customer service. You love people and love to enrich their lives through dialogue about our products as well. Having a detailed knowledge, you’re not just serving information, but are also making recommendations and play an advisory role.

You are the heart of our reputation, and ensure feedback flows to all teams in order to improve and innovate our services. And you spark customers with new ways to make their experience continuously better.

We are aiming to be the gold standard for customer support in the beauty industry. Customer support is extremely important to us, and we only hire the warmest and the most positive, genuine and dedicated people to represent our company.

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments, including receiving awards like "Top Team Leader of the Year", "Employee of the Year", and demonstrating swift career progression into higher roles.
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service. Most of the support will be conducted via email and chat. However, proficiency in phone support is a plus.
• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. Your level of English needs to be on the level that an English native speaker thinks they are talking to another native speaker. Adherence to a specific writing style (a mix between friendly/semi-casual and formal; depending on the occasion), flawless grammar, and punctuation standards is highly required.
• Enabling an empathy-driven approach by providing exceptional customer service and fostering positive relationships with customers through email communication.
• Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
• Reliable Computer/Laptop
• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary
• Training and Development Opportunities
• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you provide an example of a challenging customer situation you've successfully resolved in the past?
3.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
4.) Schedule Availability:
4.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
4.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
5.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
6.) Take the following tests and attach the 4 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
6.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
6.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
6.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
6.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

We are expanding and looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you feel you meet our qualifications and requirements, we strongly encourage you to apply. Please follow the provided instructions to ensure your application is considered.

title: WordPress Developer / Website Designer
description:
About Us: We are seeking a talented WordPress Developer to join our growing team and help us build and maintain high-performing, responsive, and visually appealing websites that provide an exceptional user experience.

Job Overview: As a WordPress Developer, you will be responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including creating WordPress themes and plugins. You will be expected to have a strong understanding of the latest industry trends and content management systems. This role requires a blend of programming skills (namely PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript) and aesthetics (understanding element arrangements on the screen, the color and font choices, and so on).

Key Responsibilities:

Develop, customize, and maintain WordPress websites, themes, and plugins according to project requirements.
Ensure high-performance and availability, and manage all technical aspects of the CMS.
Work closely with designers to implement new features and functionalities.
Optimize websites for speed, scalability, and SEO.
Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues across various browsers and devices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement innovative solutions for website direction, visuals, and features.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in WordPress development.
Conduct website performance tests and optimize site load time and performance metrics.
Ensure website accessibility and implement best practices for inclusive design.
Provide technical support and training to clients or internal team members.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a WordPress Developer, with a strong portfolio of past work.
Proficiency in front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Experience with PHP and MySQL.
In-depth knowledge of WordPress architecture, theme customization, and plugin development.
Familiarity with responsive design principles and frameworks.
Strong understanding of website optimization tools and techniques (e.g., caching, minification).
Knowledge of SEO best practices and website analytics.
Ability to convert comprehensive layouts and wireframes into working HTML pages.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.
Experience with version control (e.g., Git) is a plus.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and JSON is a plus.
Experience with eCommerce platforms (e.g., WooCommerce) is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field, or equivalent work experience.
Experience with website migration and hosting environments.
Familiarity with modern web technologies such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Understanding of the full web development process, including design, development, and deployment.

How to Apply:

1. An introduction video of yourself .
2. Past WordPress / Website projects and what was your contribution.
3. How many total years of experience do you have?
4. What is your hourly rate. Please do not give me freelancing rate where the job is not consistent.

title: Real Estate Data Analyst
description:
Hi there - please read the entire listing before applying! We provided specific instructions on how exactly to apply for this role.

We are looking to add a part-time Data Analyst to our team over at TheLandPioneer.com.

Our business sells vacant land all across the United States. We only specialize in vacant land, and do not sell any other type of real estate. We currently generate 250-400 new buyer leads per month, and are selling about 5-12 properties per month.

In this role, you’ll be responsible for analyzing data, selecting hot markets by County or ZIP code, pulling property owner data, scrubbing and removing unwanted properties, skip tracing to obtain property owners' contact information, and formatting the dataset for use in multiple marketing campaigns using our own platform, LandInsights.


Job Description for Data Analyst includes but is not limited to:


1) Analyzing the data for each market using LandInsights
2) Selecting the hot markets
3) Pulling property owner data
4) Scrubbing and removing unwanted properties (using LandInsights)
5) Skip tracing to obtain property owners' contact information
6) Formatting the dataset for use in multiple marketing campaigns using our own platform

Our business requires you to develop a deep understanding of vacant land in the United States. Our team provides training on this, but you must be motivated to learn. We expect that you'll spend the first 14 days on the job going through our training and preparing yourself.


Soft Skills Needed...

1) Fluent in both spoken and written English.
2) Detail Orientated
3) Kind and empathetic
4) Hungry for professional growth (We want someone who is motivated to help others)
5) Previous experience as a data analyst is preferred but not required.

Technical Skills needed…
1) Familiarity with LandInsights or similar softwares (Preferable but not required.)
2) CRM experience: we use Follow Up Boss (Preferable but not required.)
2) Familiar with G Suite
3) Familiar with using Redfin, Zillow, and other listing websites to source property information
4) Slack for team communication
5) Any additional real estate information is a huge bonus


Schedule:

Part-Time Role
10-15hrs per week
Monday - Friday (Between 9am PST to 5pm PST).
Pay Structure:
Base Salary $3//hr to start.

If you'd like to apply, please do the following (if you do not follow the rules, we will disregard your resume)

-Please mention the Job Title in Subject Line of the email you are sending
- Complete short english test and send results to newman@thelandpioneer.com link: www.cambridgeenglish.org/test-your-english/general-english/
- Watch this entire video about our land investing business www.youtube.com/watch?v=MI-65t3Lb5U
- Send audio recording about what you learned from the video about our business to newman@thelandpioneer.com
- Send resume to newman@thelandpioneer.com
- Please make sure all these files are being sent as an email attachment, please DO NOT use G Drive Links to share your CV.

title: VA Medical Assistant
description:
Job Title: VA Medical Assistant

Summary
Performs administrative and certain clinical tasks under the direction of assigned medical providers by performing the following duties.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities 

• Assists with getting patients checked in virtually for their visit. Enters medications and ROS, and meaningful use information. 
• Reviews discharge instructions and sends to patients in Athena patient portal.
• Navigate proficiently within Athenahealth, NSC’s EMR
• Responsible for appropriately handling incoming clinical questions for your provider(s) and communicating with the team. 
• Responsible for checking personal and provider staff Athena inboxes daily.
• Barcode, scan, or fax clinical paperwork from office visits for assigned providers.
• Assists providers by following proper procedures and administering health history questionnaires.
• Reviews charts for assigned providers and requests records/medication lists as needed. Demonstrates follow through in obtaining records/medication lists.
• Sends referrals/orders for assigned providers.
• Processes all medication and imaging prior authorizations and denials/appeals. 
• Reviews documents for accuracy before having the provider sign off on them. Add them to the appropriate section of the chart. Distribute plan of care/certification/recertification home health orders to billing. 
• Checks and returns voicemails daily. Document calls via patient case. Handle urgent calls immediately. 
• Obtain medication and imaging prior authorizations as needed. 
• Administer and read TB injections annually.
• Contact drug representatives when medication samples are running low. Demonstrate follow through with obtaining samples.
• Floats and covers other medical assistants when necessary.
• Maintain close professional relationships with neurosurgery offices and hospital staff related to scheduling of patients for urgent needs as well as DBS referrals and DBS surgeries (initial implants and battery replacements).
• Interrogates DBS patients and alerts AP of abnormal values. Train in basic DBS programming evolving to more advanced techniques depending on proficiency and need for training and AP supervision.
• Perform incident to clinical visits (video telemedicine; supervised by NSC advanced providers as needed) to include the following:
o Contribute with scribing for prescription metabolic enhancing foods (electrolyte/osmolyte and meal replacement drinks/shakes) visits and mitochondrial/stem cell supporting supplements. 
• Assist the practice as we expand services including Metabolic Optimization Clinic; Metabolic Supplements/Drinks; Physical Training/Light Therapy; IV Infusion Clinic; Aesthetic Clinic including injection procedures.
• Assists with other duties, as assigned.

Qualifications 
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. Healthcare experience required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Education and/or Experience 
Minimum 5+ years related experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience. Bachelor’s degree in Healthcare highly preferred. 

Minimum 2 years Athenahealth EMR experience required. An intermediate or greater level of proficiency including scheduling and reporting functionality is preferred.

Language Skills 
Ability to read and comprehend simple instructions, short correspondence, and memos. Ability to write simple correspondence. Ability to effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization.

Mathematical Skills 
Ability to add, subtract, multiply, and divide in all units of measure, using whole numbers, common fractions, and decimals. Ability to compute rate, ratio, and percent and to draw and interpret bar graphs.

Reasoning Ability 
Ability to apply common sense understanding to carry out instructions furnished in written, oral, or diagram form. Ability to deal with problems involving several concrete variables in standardized situations.

title: SEO Specialist (Remote, UK Time)
description:
To proceed with your application, please answer this test: https://forms.gle/PNGU9ST5n6NvGwQT9

Culture: Asynchronous, fast-paced, less supervised, international team, proactive 

Avoid using unedited AIs. We focus on experience rather than the degree. Once you passed, we will discuss with your expected rate and relevant experience. We will only evaluate your application once the test is taken.

Salary: $600 
Hours: 20 hours per week (Subject to performance-based full-time increase)

Job Overview:
We are seeking a knowledgeable and experienced SEO Strategist to join our dynamic SEO content agency. 

The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of search engine optimization (SEO) practices and the ability to implement effective strategies to improve our online visibility, drive organic traffic, and increase conversions. 

The SEO Strategist will be responsible for planning, implementing, and managing the SEO strategy for our clients and our website.

Key Responsibilities:
SEO Content Calendar Management
Conduct regular keyword research to identify traffic and revenue growth opportunities.
Assign various topics to target based on key metrics.
SEO Website Content Auditing:
Conduct comprehensive audits of website content to ensure alignment with SEO best practices.
Identifying pages and queries to quickly rank higher for through content updates, rewriting and internal linking.
Ensure all content is optimized for target keywords and user intent.

SEO Competitor Analysis:
Analysing the competitors’ SEO strategy, including their subfolders, the pages they create and the topics they tackle.
Setting a standard based on competitor content around word count, content quality, and backlinks.
Deriving recommendations from the strategy of various competitor websites.

Content Strategy:
Collaborate with the content team to create SEO-friendly content that engages and converts.
Analyze content performance and provide recommendations for improvement.
Create and implement comprehensive SEO strategies that align with business goals.
Develop link-building strategies to enhance domain authority and search engine rankings.
On-Page and Off-Page Optimization:
Optimize website content, meta tags, headers, and images for search engines.
Ensure website architecture is optimized for crawling and indexing by search engines.
Manage and improve on-page SEO, including site structure, internal linking, and HTML tags.
Stay Current with SEO Trends:
Keep up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithm updates, and best practices.
Implement new strategies and tactics as the SEO landscape evolves.

Good to know
Perform regular technical audits of the website to ensure SEO best practices are being followed.
Address and resolve technical issues that may impact search engine rankings.
Monitor and improve page load speeds, mobile-friendliness, and overall user experience.

Analytics and Reporting:
Use SEO tools and analytics platforms to monitor performance and identify areas for improvement.
Track and report on key SEO metrics, including organic traffic, rankings, and conversions.
Provide regular updates and actionable insights to stakeholders.

Qualifications:
3+ years of proven experience as an SEO Strategist or similar role.
In-depth knowledge of SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs).
Strong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.
Excellent analytical, organizational, and time management skills.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with content management systems (CMS) like WordPress.
Knowledge of pay-per-click (PPC) advertising and how it integrates with SEO.
Familiarity with social media platforms and their impact on SEO.
Certification in Google Analytics or other relevant qualifications.

Why Join Us:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a talented and passionate team.
Room for growth and professional development.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.

title: US Tax Preparer (ACTIVE POOLING)
description:

About 1-800 Accountant:

1-800 Accountant is America’s leading virtual accounting firm for small businesses. Our mission is to provide financial expertise to small businesses in every industry. Our services are powered by a mix of expert CPAs and technology, enabling businesses to minimize tasks while maximizing tax savings. This allows owners to focus their time and energy on growing their businesses while we handle the rest.

title: SmartSheet Administrator - Permanent Work From Home
description:
Join GrowthAssistant as a SmartSheet Administrator!

As a SmartSheet Administrator, you will be responsible for performing a variety of administrative tasks within Smartsheet. Your focus will be on optimizing workflows and ensuring that our Smartsheet environment is effective and efficient. Your role will be crucial in maintaining the integrity and functionality of our Smartsheet documents and ensuring our operations run smoothly.


Salary Range: PHP 50,000 - 70,000 per month
Note: Rate/Salary will depend on your current competencies matched to the position’s job description and requirements based on the assessment results.


The Benefits
- Work Set-up: Permanent Work From Home
Bonuses:
- Attendance Bonus of $ 25 for every monthly perfect attendance
- Performance Bonus
- Anniversary Bonus of PHP 5,000 for your 1st year in service and PHP 10,000 for 2 years in service
- Referral Bonus of $ 300 for every successful referral
- Holiday Paid Time Off (PTO) for 7 days in a year
- Paid Time Offs (PTO) for 6 days in a year
- Prepaid Health Card

The Role / Key Responsibilities
- Create and Manage Sheets: Design and develop new Smartsheet sheets tailored to the team’s needs. Ensure all sheets are structured effectively to support business objectives.
- Modify Columns and Sheet Structures: Adjust and reorganize columns, rows, and sheet layouts to reflect data or process requirements changes.
- Correct and Maintain Formulas: Diagnose and fix formula issues, including nesting problems, to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
- Maintain Document Integrity: Keep all Smartsheet documents up-to-date, formatted correctly, and fully functional, making necessary corrections to preserve their usability.
- Collaborate with Non-Licensed Users: Work closely with team members who do not have Smartsheet licenses, handling their requested updates and edits to ensure seamless operations.
- Troubleshoot Issues: Identify and resolve technical issues within Smartsheet, minimizing disruptions and maintaining team productivity.

The Requirements:
- Smartsheet Expertise: Proven experience in Smartsheet administration, with a strong background or advanced proficiency in sheet creation, formula management, and troubleshooting.
- Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to collaborate effectively with team members and stakeholders.
- Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring that all updates and modifications are accurate and enhance functionality.
- Problem-Solving Skills: Strong ability to troubleshoot and resolve Smartsheet-related issues quickly and efficiently.
- Experience in Process Improvement: Demonstrated experience in identifying and implementing improvements to existing Smartsheet processes.
- Certifications: Smartsheet certifications are highly desirable.
- Time Zone Availability: Must be available to work within one of the following time zones: PST, CST, MST, or EST.

If you're interested, please send me the following details for faster processing: I will PRIORITIZE your application, if you will provide me the ff:
Full name: 
Email:
Mobile Number:
Send your CV/Resume or send me the link of your CV (upload it to your google drive and send me the link: should be downloadable file):
Tools used before (Ex. Notion or similar BI tools):

Clarification: (The following information below might not be disclosed in your resume):
1. How many years of Smartsheet administration experience do you have?

2. How many years of sheet creation experience do you have?

3. How many years of Python/SQL/BI (not required) experience do you have?

4. How many years of Excel or Google sheets experience do you have?

Why Join Us? 
This role offers the opportunity to work in a dynamic environment where your expertise in Smartsheet administration will directly impact our team’s efficiency and success. If you’re passionate about process optimization and enjoy solving complex challenges, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Go High Level Expert
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Go High Level expert to join our team. The ideal candidate will manage and optimize our Go High Level platform to enhance our marketing, sales, and CRM processes. This is a remote position that requires a strong understanding of the Go High Level system and its various functionalities, as well as the ability to integrate other platforms using Zapier.

Key Responsibilities:

CRM Management: Set up and manage customer relationship management (CRM) processes within Go High Level, ensuring all client data is properly organized and accessible.

Campaign Setup and Management: Create, manage, and optimize marketing campaigns, including email, SMS, and social media, within the Go High Level platform.
 
Email Automation: Develop and implement automated email sequences for lead nurturing, client onboarding, and retention, ensuring personalized and timely communication.

Automation: Develop and implement workflows and automations to streamline processes and improve efficiency across sales and marketing functions.

Lead Management: Handle lead capture, segmentation, and nurturing strategies to drive conversion and improve ROI.

Funnel Building: Design and build sales funnels using Go High Level, including landing pages, forms, and triggers.

Integration with Other Platforms: Use Zapier to connect Go High Level with other tools and platforms as needed, ensuring seamless data flow and process automation.

Gym Check-In Integration: Set up and manage integrations between Go High Level and gym check-in systems, ensuring that all check-ins are accurately captured and reflected in Go High Level.

Reporting and Analytics: Generate and analyze reports to track the performance of campaigns, workflows, and overall CRM health.

Technical Support: Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance related to Go High Level for team members.

Qualifications:

Proven experience working with Go High Level, including CRM management, campaign creation, and automation.

Strong understanding of digital marketing strategies and sales funnels.

Experience with email automation, including the creation of automated email sequences.

Experience with lead management and nurturing processes.

Ability to create and optimize workflows and automations within Go High Level.

Experience with Zapier for connecting Go High Level to other platforms.

Ability to integrate gym check-in systems with Go High Level, ensuring seamless data capture.

Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in integrating Go High Level with other marketing and sales tools.

Knowledge of email marketing best practices and strategies.

Familiarity with data analysis and reporting tools.

Salary and Benefits:

Competitive salary based on experience ranging from $5 to $11
Opportunity for bonuses based on performance.
Flexible working hours.
Work remotely from the comfort of your home.
Opportunity to fly to US for work related events.

How to Apply:

If you meet the above qualifications and are excited about contributing to our team, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience with Go High Level and Zapier integrations. Write in the title "GO HIGH LEVEL APPLICATION" We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Technical Cold Email Marketing Expert
description:
Job Overview:
I am seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Technical Cold Email Marketing Expert. This role is crucial for driving lead generation and customer acquisition through targeted, personalized cold email campaigns. The ideal candidate will have deep technical expertise in email marketing tools, automation platforms, and data analytics, combined with a creative mindset for crafting compelling email copy that converts. You will be responsible for the end-to-end process of cold email outreach, from strategy development to execution and performance analysis.

Key Responsibilities:
Cold Email Campaign Strategy: Develop and implement effective cold email marketing strategies to generate leads, nurture prospects, and drive conversions. Identify target audiences, segment lists, and personalize email content.

Technical Setup & Management: Set up and configure email marketing platforms and CRM systems (e.g., Instantly & Monday.com). Manage email lists, segment data, and ensure proper tracking of all email activities.
 
Email Automation & Sequences: Design, build, and optimize automated email sequences (e.g., drip campaigns, follow-ups) to maximize engagement and conversion rates. A/B test email templates and workflows.

Copywriting & Content Creation: Write engaging, persuasive, and personalized email copy that resonates with the target audience. Tailor messaging based on prospect behavior and data insights.

Deliverability & Compliance: Monitor email deliverability rates and implement best practices to minimize spam complaints and ensure compliance with CAN-SPAM, GDPR, and other relevant regulations.

Performance Tracking & Optimization: Analyze campaign performance metrics (open rates, click-through rates, response rates, conversions) and provide actionable insights to optimize future campaigns. Create detailed reports to track KPIs and ROI.

Collaboration: Work closely with the sales, marketing, and product teams to align email campaigns with broader marketing initiatives and business goals. Share insights and feedback to improve overall strategy.

Stay Updated: Keep up with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in email marketing, lead generation, and digital marketing technologies.

Qualifications:
Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in cold email marketing, with a proven track record of successful campaigns in a B2B environment. 
Technical Expertise: Proficient in email marketing platforms (e.g., Instantly & Monday.com ) and CRM systems. Strong understanding of email deliverability, list management, and automation workflows.
Copywriting Skills: Excellent writing and editing skills, with the ability to craft compelling and personalized email content that drives action.
Analytical Mindset: Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, generate insights, and make data-driven decisions.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous in managing lists, segmenting data, and ensuring accurate targeting in campaigns.
Compliance Knowledge: Familiarity with email marketing laws and regulations (e.g., CAN-SPAM, GDPR) and best practices for maintaining compliance.
Communication Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Problem-Solving: Proactive in identifying challenges and finding creative solutions to improve email performance.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with advanced email tools (e.g., Litmus, SendGrid, Woodpecker, Lemlist).
Knowledge of HTML/CSS for email design.
Familiarity with sales processes and alignment of marketing campaigns with sales goals.
Experience in a SaaS, tech, or digital marketing agency environment.

What We Offer:
Training from LeadGenJay
Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
Professional development opportunities 

If you are the best of the best, please reach out. Let's make a lot of money.

title: Purchasing Coordinator
description: The Purchasing Agent is responsible for sourcing, negotiating, and purchasing parts, while also assisting with administrative operational tasks. The scope requires high attention to detail, superior analytical skills, patience with a lot of manual processing while mastering systems used in purchasing activity. Great communication skills and follow-through to ensure transactions are done on time, accurately and in line with divisional standards.

title: Personal assistant
description:
Personal assistant 
Nice to meet you. I'm Nick. 
I am looking for a personal assistant to help me organize my life better. 

Thank you for reading my ad post. 
Here's some information about me: 
I'm a 36 years old entrepreneur. I immigrated to USA from Uzbekistan 17 years ago. 
I am a partner and CEO of 5 businesses: 4 dental offices, and a dental assisting school. 
I also have 2 rental apartments that I just need to keep track of finances. 

I am also a father of 2 kids. One important thing about me is I'm VERY unorganized. 
I run all those businesses but at the same time cannot manage my calendar and stick to a scheduled meeting because I sometimes get too busy ,my attention switches to another task, or I simply forget. possibly I have a bad case of ADHD so, my assistant will have to be insistent. 
I'm also trying to have a better family/ health/ business balance, but also don't want to send the wrong message to my team and have them think that I'm forgetting about the business. 
I need the personal assistant to help me with business, quick books, personal daily planning and automation ( which I love) 

Ideal candidate knows quick books, has previous experience with personal assisting, younger than 35( just to be savvy with all the new apps and tech) , knows how to do basic computer tasks.

Please apply only in the following way, NO OTHER APPLICATION TYPE PLEASE: 

record a short audio or video of you telling me about your previous experience with personal assisting and answer the question: why should I hire YOU. 

Send this audio /video to Whatsapp +12153915939, using embedded WhatsApp message, NOT as a link to another website. 



Below is a list of some of the things I came up with that I need your help: 

Weekly quick books entries and receipts organizing: 
Create and start using quick books for businesses and for my real estate. I send all receipts and expenses to you in Whatsapp/ telegram, you add them to QuickBooks and categorize them. 

Have access to my business credit card and categorize all transactions. 

Categorize all checks : I send you a report or picture of the check, you enter into QB. 

Enter all venmo and paypal transactions and add new people / companies to vendors lists as we go. 

Help me with payroll.
Login to each office twice a month and go through each payroll. Notice any unusual hours ( eg: more than 8 hours per day no break etc) 
Create a print out grid and send it to me

For doctors payroll: run the report of each doctor from the dates that last payroll ended on. Send me monthly reports for all doctors. 



Shopping for groceries
We will Come up with a list of foods we cook , you will use food delivery apps to shop and deliver the ingredients to my home on Saturday/Wednesday. 

Have access to all my emails boxes: 
Clean up emails to zero
Only leave important emails
Unsubscribe from all junk


Have a list of all bills due dates and pay the ones that are not automated

Do a graph of personal utility bills and send me once every 3 months ( gas, electric, 

Schedule meetings and zoom meetings with staff

Research contractors and products

Remind me daily to do things that are important / help me build good habits 

Business payments reconciliations: Get the list of all payments from each office once a month( care credit, credit card, alphaeon, sunbit, cherry) and login to the bank to make sure the deposits match 

Check deposits reconciliation for each office

Calendar : 
Help with scheduling each next day at a certain time : 10 minute chat to go over important tasks that I have currently, and place them on my calendar for the next day/week/ month. I will add tasks to the calendar, you will have access to them. 

Routinely research dental offices for sale
Notify me with occasional listings. 

Count calories by picture( I send a picture of a meal, you count calories using apps such as Fat secrets ) 

Remind to drink enough water throughout the day


Create ads and posts on fiver and indeed
Review and call indeed applicants and schedule interviews with them. Confirm the interviews and update the calendar. Send me a message with confirmed interviews dates and locations.

Stitch up family videos and shorts and upload them to YouTube

Remind about repeating non automated planned things on the calendar( car wash, payments, send checks) 

Research and buy airline tickets and hotels according to the requirements

Help me write my book : weekly reminders, plan,

title: Success Manager
description:
We are a dynamic and fast-growing credit repair company, Helping Hands Financials LLC, committed to helping individuals improve their financial health and achieve their dreams. Our mission is to empower our clients through credit repair services, ensuring they have access to better opportunities and a brighter future. Our core values of self-improvement, result-orientation, inspiration, trustworthiness, discipline, coachability, and ambition are the driving force behind our success.

Contrary to the normal hiring situation, we are looking ONLY for long term committed workers that can grow within our company and provide a stable backbone within our growing company. Our desired candidate has no other job that will infringe upon the time we require our staff members to be active and working.

Position Synopsis:
Success Managers at HHF take clients from poor credit standing to positive credit standing with the assistance of a team of disputers and the rest of the HHF support team. Success Managers are the front line, client facing team member who has a direct influence and impact on the client during their credit repair journey. Candidates are empathetic, positive, precise, encouraging, and consistent.

Shift:
CST: Monday - Friday 8:30AM (0830) - 6:00PM (1800)
1 hour paid lunch break

Pay:
Salary pay
$500/month during probation period (90 days.)
$600/month after probation period. (Benefits start during this time frame.)
Yearly review based on performance for salary increases and advancement opportunities.

Benefits
Quarterly bonuses available after probation ($200-800 each quarter based on performance.)
PTO available after probation (10 days per calendar year.)
Off for select American holidays, described in staff handbook received upon hiring.

Job Requirements:
Customer Service Experience - 2+ years, within the past 5 years.
Deescalation Skills - Ability to deescalate elevated emotions within a client in order to communicate and retain clients.
Strong proficiency in English - Verbal and written.
Prompt Professional Communication - Ability to address client inquiries, concerns, and requests promptly and professionally.
Self-Motivated - Driven to complete tasks and manage time in an efficient manner.
Long Term Commitment - We are hiring permanent staff members, not temporary.
High speed internet access - Possesses high quality internet in order to communicate with clients via CRM and zoom meetings.
Stable PC/Laptop setup - Stable location for work setup to present professional experience to clients during calls and zoom meetings.
Departmental Coordination - Ability to coordinate between departments to provide full service to the client, including disputing, credit analysis, billing, legal concerns, and more.
Longterm Credit Coaching - Ability to maintain 6+ month relationships with clients in a professional coaching setting and manner.

Preferred Hard Skills:
Asana - Prior experience in using software for task management and team collaboration purposes.
Google Suite - Prior experience in using the suite of software services for team collaboration and communication.
Zoom - Prior experience using zoom software as host to coordinate meetings, present materials, and communicate with new and existing clients.
Close - Prior experience using the CRM software for client calling, texting, emailing, and detail tracking.
Credit Repair Cloud Software - Prior experience in utilizing credit repair cloud software.
Credit Repair Knowledge - In-depth working knowledge of credit repair processes, FDCPA regulations, and current credit laws.

Preferred Soft Skills:
Empathetic - Ability to relate to client’s life situations.
Ability to hold firm - Able to hold clients firm to the program while using and maintaining and gentle and professional touch.
Detail-Oriented - Ability to pay meticulous attention to credit reports and identify discrepancies.
Problem-Solving Skills - Capability to identify problems and come up with suggestions for solutions.
Positive and upbeat attitude with a track record of working effectively in a team environment.
