title: DevOps Engineer
description:
This is an opportunity to join our SaaS Customer Engagement Platform company as a Remote DevOps Engineer. We are looking for a highly motivated, self-starting candidate.

Role description:

The ideal candidate will have strong experience in Azure and Office 365 management. As an Azure DevOps Engineer, the candidate is responsible for developing and delivering scripts and automation tools used to build, integrate, and deploy software releases to various platforms. The candidate will ensure solutions are built based on company standards and can be deployed efficiently. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English are required.

Responsibilities:

• Architect, develop, deploy, and evolve CI and CD systems for our cloud applications.
• Write application deployment automation using industry-standard deployment and configuration tools.
• Provide systems support, including responding to monitoring alerts.
• Implement and stay abreast of Cloud and DevOps industry best practices and tooling.
• Write documentation for security certification applications and audits.
• Monitor system performance.

Skills and Experience Required:

• Strong hands-on expertise in diverse DevSecOps concepts and tools, especially Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Pipelines, and GitHub.
• Expertise in Azure App Services, SQL Database, and Virtual Machines, among other Azure services.
• Excellent communication, presentation, and coding abilities.
• Experience with the administration of Office 365.
• Experience documenting infrastructure for use in security compliance filings.

To apply:

• Provide a resume/CV (link or pdf).
• Include a cover letter with a brief summary of your relevant experience and why you are interested in this position.
• When applying, use the subject line: 'DevOps - [Your Name]'.

title: Senior .NET Developer - Remote
description:
Overview
Velaro Workspace is a next-generation engagement platform that integrates various communication channels such as Live Chat, Messaging, Chatbots, Voice, and Knowledge Base, revolutionizing how businesses connect with their customers. We are on a mission to enhance customer engagement through innovative chat solutions and seamless integrations.

Job Description
We are looking for a talented and motivated Senior .NET Developer to join our Los Angeles-based company remotely. You will work on exciting projects involving a variety of cutting-edge technologies. This position requires working remotely during East Coast US hours. 

Why Join Us
• Work with a dynamic, sharp, and fun group of engineers.
• Enjoy flexible work hours.
• Engage in challenging and exciting projects.
• Have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies.
• Contribute your ideas and lead impactful projects.

Key Responsibilities
• Develop and maintain web applications using C#, .NET, ASP.NET, TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS.
• Design and build robust .NET APIs and work with .NET Core.
• Implement and read third-party API documentation.
• Write unit tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
• Collaborate with the team using git, ClickUp, and participate actively in scrum processes.
• Address security and scalability considerations in development.
• Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders.

Qualifications
• Proven experience in C# and .NET development.
• Hands-on web development experience with ASP.NET, TypeScript, React, and SQL.
• Ability to read and implement third-party API documentation.
• Experience in designing and building .NET APIs and developing with .NET Core.
• Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive, self-driven attitude.
• Familiarity with GIT and ClickUp and Jira.
• Experience working in a scrum team.
• Knowledge of PHP is a plus.
• Understanding of security and scalability best practices is advantageous.

Application Process
- Submit a link to your CV (required) and your LinkedIn profile (optional, if you have one).

- To streamline our selection process, only candidates who answer the following questions will be considered:
Question 1: Can you explain your understanding of how to design and build .NET APIs? Provide an example of an API you have developed, including the technologies and frameworks you used.
Question2: Have you previously worked with ASP.NET, TypeScript, and React? If so, please provide examples of your work and explain your contributions to those projects.

- Ensure the subject line is formatted as follows: [Your Name] - Senior .NET Dev.

We look forward to reviewing your responses.

title: Executive and Administrative Assistant for Jennifer - Looking for a Unicorn!
description:
Here’s a quick video introducing the job and the client: https://www.loom.com/share/6c3dff3be49a40be9609c9384f33131d?sid=e6e4608d-c0b4-47e0-aad1-3f9032b1097b 

I’m Rhino Julie, and I LOVE building super teams to service our clients' needs.

If you love a challenge, love problem solving, love working with others (and also love working by yourself LOL), and it makes you happy when you overdeliver for clients, I want you on my team!

My promise to you:
*I provide a FUN working environment.
*We are constantly learning new things.
*We are a team who wants to be the best at what we do, which means you have the BEST teammates.
*I ALWAYS pay on time.
*I treat all of my team members with respect and love.

Client Overview:
*Jennifer is a successful entrepreneur, speaker, and influencer who helps high-achieving women over 40 achieve an emotional AND physical transformation through her Weight Loss Method. She has a very successful business and team, she’s just looking for an equally amazing unicorn who can help her and her team with administrative tasks. 

Client Requirements:
*Must be able to work any 4-hour block between 9am-4pm Mountain Time (US)
*Must have experience as an executive or administrative assistant
*Must be able to track metrics and collect and analyze data to create reports
*Familiarity with funnels is nice to have
*Basic automation knowledge is nice to have
*Must have basic familiarity with business operational concepts such as budgets, SOPs, workflows, project planning, quarterly planning, etc.
*Must be a problem solver and strategic thinker
*Must have high attention to detail and accuracy.
*Must have strong verbal and written communication skills
*Must be super organized 
*Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality control
*Must be female
*Must be comfortable working in an environment where things can change quickly. Jennifer’s company doesn’t change things willy-nilly, but they’re also a small business which means our processes, systems, and ways of doing things are still evolving.
*Must have a NON-NEGOTIABLE belief that Black Lives Matter, Love Is Love, women’s rights are human rights, ability manifests in multiple forms, equity (not just diversity and inclusion) is mandatory, and that being part of a vision & values-led business is the ONLY type of job for you

Software tools used by the client (it’s okay if you’re not familiar with some of these tools):
*Zoom
*OnceHub
*Google Drive
*ConvertKit
*ActiveCampaign
*Slack
*Asana
*Canva
*Google Sheets
*Google Docs

Responsibilities/Tasks:
Administrative and Executive Support:
*Ensure that Jennifer’s time and energy are supported, cherished, and protected at all times
*Triage all email inboxes ensuring communications are responded to promptly and professionally, and drafting/sending responses to those that do not require further input
*Facilitate clear and effective communications amongst the team, clients, and third-party vendors, coordinating scheduling, following up on dropped communication threads, and ensuring that deadlines and deliverables are accurately recorded, assigned, and acknowledged in the team's project management system
*Maintain the company’s organizational systems, ensuring that all data is stored in its correct location, updating as required, and archiving items that are no longer in use
*Proactively administer the CEO’s calendar in alignment with their ideal week, addressing overbookings/boundary violations, scheduling/rescheduling appointments accurately, and supporting them in prioritizing high-impact activities 
*Ensure the CEO is prepared for all meetings and events through the coordination of logistics, researching & preparing pre-meeting briefings, taking notes during the meetings, handling requests as they arise, and updating project management software with action items from the meetings
*As you become more familiar with their tools, methods, and operations support the improvement of the company’s delivery by flagging gaps, bottlenecks, friction points, or opportunities for discussion and resolution

Social Media Engagement and Marketing Support:
*Publish/monitor the company’s marketing content, engage with audience members to build relationships, identify women who are a good fit for their program, and support the client purchasing process
*Publish and monitor approved marketing materials, reporting on their performance and effectiveness
*Review, moderate, and ensure responses are given to all comments, inquiries, etc from public-facing channels (Facebook pages & groups, Instagram, YouTube, email, etc.) ensuring that each person feels seen and heard.
*Support the upkeep of the company’s lead tracking system, utilizing rubrics to evaluate the potential suitability of an audience member, monitoring leads for changes, and communicating/following up as appropriate.
*Monitor, record, and report on Marketing KPIs, identifying basic trends, comparing their performance against quarterly targets, and flagging them for team discussion.
*Proactively communicate & schedule vendors, guest speakers, team members, and audience members; ensuring minimal disruption to the company’s marketing and marketing tech systems
*Support the overall sales & marketing process by addressing relevant administrative tasks including but not limited to scheduling/rescheduling calls, providing payment links/invoices/receipts, and ensuring the smooth transition of converted clients into the company’s onboarding process.

Client Support:
*Provide clients with high-touch, personalized support, ensuring that they feel seen, heard and well taken care of throughout their time with us.
*Administrate and moderate the clients' only Facebook group, providing accountability, support, approved resources and encouragement to clients when challenges arise while maintaining approachable professionalism
*Address basic client support requests within one business day such as basic tech support (password resets, etc.) tracking overdue payments, uploading invoices for bookkeeping, spam filtering, etc.
*Assist in the onboarding and graduation of clients by providing administrative support to both the client and the team, ensuring processes/policies are followed
*Provide administrative support before, during, and after client calls/events ensuring that everyone has what they need so the event runs smoothly
*Update & maintain the client portal and related program materials, converting & publishing approved copy into content using the appropriate templates and reviewing/testing the materials for errors
*Proactively communicate with vendors, team members, and clients to ensure minimal disruption to the clients and related tech systems

---------

If you know in your heart this job is for you, please apply on our super quick application system by clicking here: https://app.loxo.co/job/MjUwMTMtdXZzdjc5dzI4OGRnazN4Zw== 

You only have to apply for one job through our portal, and then you can email us if you want to be considered for additional positions.

We have many positions available, so even if this one isn't a perfect fit, if you are a hard worker who loves learning and pays attention to the details, we will probably have something else available for you!

----------------

Our super cool hiring process:

*We have real people communicating with you and looking at your application!
*We PAY you to take a Paid Test for the client you're applying for to make sure you like the job and you have the skills for it. 
*At any time, you can check out the other clients we have and ask to take Paid Tests for them, as well!

Please note that there is a 1-time Profile that you will help us fill out before the Paid Test. This profile will be sent to our clients, along with your Paid Test results. We value you as a person, and we value your time. Once you're in with Rhino Squad, you're IN, and you have lots of job opportunities available to you. So we appreciate your help in preparing your details to present to our clients.

IMPORTANT: Do not book on Rhino Julie's client booking page, this causes our potential clients to be unable to book sales calls with her. We love your enthusiasm, but Rhino Julie's job is to get clients for our virtual assistants to get their dream jobs. Our recruitment team’s job is to take care of our applicants and help them match with their dream job. So, please apply here for your dream job and we will invite you for an interview if your qualifications match the job you're interested in. We cannot stress how important it is to leave her calendar open for her client calls.

title: Virtual Assistant for Mid-term Rental Business
description:
JOB OVERVIEW
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our dynamic mid term / long term apartment rental business. This remote position is essential to ensuring seamless operations and exceptional guest experiences. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing communications with guests, coordinating with cleaning and maintenance staff, and maintaining an efficient workflow. We value hardworking individuals who exhibit excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English.

You will be working USA hours starting at 8am PST - 5pm PST

Must have experience (confirm when reaching out):
- Prior experience with rental companies
- Hospitable
- Furnish Finder
- Airbnb
- Slack
- Google Workspace

Good to have experience
- Turno
- Latch
- OpenPhone
- Quickbooks
- VRBO
- Booking.com
- Zillow

Key Responsibilities:

Guest Communication:
- Promptly respond to guest inquiries and messages in a professional and hospitable manner.
- Manage booking requests, process reservations, and handle any changes or cancellations.
- Provide guests with clear instructions and helpful information regarding their stay, including check-in/out procedures, house - rules, and local recommendations.
- Manage all communication from our direct bookings and through rental platforms such as Airbnb.

Scheduling and Coordination:
- Manage the calendar to make sure we are keeping occupancy rates high. 
- Organize and schedule cleaning services before and after guest stays, ensuring the property is always in pristine condition.
- Submit Maintience requests 
- Keep track of inventory and reorder supplies as needed, liaising with suppliers and managing deliveries.

Administrative Tasks:
- Assist in managing the listings on Airbnb, VRBO, Zillow, Booking.com, and Hospitable by updating availability, and ensuring the accuracy of information and photos.
- Provide regular reports on guest feedback, occupancy rates, and other relevant metrics.

Guest Relations:
- Build positive relationships with guests to encourage repeat bookings, 5-star reviews, and referrals.
- Ideally we want a 5-star review for every booking.
- Assisting guests with issues or concerns during their stay and helping to resolve any disputes or conflicts.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
- Fluency in English: Must possess excellent command of the English language, both written and spoken, for clear and effective communication.
- Detail-oriented: Strong attention to detail to ensure accuracy in all aspects of the role.
- Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently and effectively, prioritizing as necessary.
- Tech-Savvy: Proficient in using communication tools (e.g., email, messaging apps, Slack).
Problem-Solving: Capable of handling unexpected situations or guest requests with professionalism and composure.
- Effective Communication: Ability to communicate with guests on the phone, providing the best possible customer service.
Assisting guests with issues or concerns during their stay and helping to resolve any disputes or conflicts.

Additional Information:
- This is a remote position
- This job requires a minimum of 40 hours/week
- This job must be your ONLY job

Please include "Sky's the Limit" at the top of your inquiry.

title: Shape the Future: «SR. WORDPRESS DEVELOPER» with ^_^ Amazing Benefits ^_^
description:

title: Executive and Marketing VA
description:
About Offshore Launch

Offshore Launch is a staffing agency that specializes in helping small business owners scale their operations with the top 1% of global remote talent. We are a people-centered agency with a passion for leaving every person and business in a better position than we found them.

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Impact the growth and success of small and medium-sized businesses.

- Access comprehensive benefits that include HMO, PTO, professional development, and an overall emphasis on teamwork and collaboration.
- Contribute to a culture that values partnership, service, and excellence.

Your Role

As an employee of Offshore Launch, you are being hired for a unique role within a target Client’s company. We value long-term partnerships, and seek to recruit talent that will serve an individual Client’s business for multiple years.

You will work full-time with the Client company. However, the Agency provides ongoing support to ensure your continued success. As such, we create space for ongoing check-ins, feedback and development through:

- Membership in the Offshore Launch Slack workspace
- Bi-weekly All Team meetings
- Monthly reviews

Your job is to help the Client succeed.

Our job is to help you succeed.

About the Client:

We're dedicated to making a difference in every aspect of our operations. We help our clients manage life’s demands by providing personalized assistance, allowing them to focus on what truly matters. 

We are looking for a dedicated Executive and Marketing VA to join our team. This role involves handling a variety of administrative tasks to support our daily operations and client communications.

Join us to help make a tangible difference in our clients' lives and the broader community!

Responsibilities:
- Manage invoicing and expense entries.
- Create proposals using Bonsai.
- Manage and update HubSpot and Klaviyo for customer and networking contact emails.
- Develop and manage HubSpot and Klaviyo marketing emails and other automation tasks.

- Write and edit content for blogs, client newsletters, and team newsletters.

- Research grants, contests, speaker opportunities, associations, podcasts, and interview opportunities.
- Conduct keyword research and manage trending hashtags.

- Update and manage tracking spreadsheets related to various operational tasks.

Requirements:

- 2+ years experience with copy writing and content creation preferred.
- Experience working in a fast-paced, startup-type environment.
- Proficiency with Klaviyo, HubSpot, Quickbooks, Google Suite, Calendly and Bonsai preferred.
- Excellent writing and communication skills.
- Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Self-motivated with a keen attention to detail.

Compensation & Benefits (to be provided by Offshore Launch):

- $950-$1150 depends on experience
- 13th month pay
- Performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive HMO policy, including dependents.
- Annual continuing education budget to support professional development
- Start date: August 12, 2024

Note: The Client is not involved in compensation or benefits. As an employee of Offshore Launch, all compensation and benefits are to be provided by the Agency.

title: E-Commerce Product Manager
description:
We are a growing company with 3 E-commerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: IT & Go High Level Specialist
description:
Join our dynamic team at New York Music Center / New York City Piano Academy, a leading music education institution committed to excellence. We're seeking a passionate Digital Marketing Expert and IT to amplify our online presence and maximize our lead generation.

Role Description:
IT & Go High Level Specialist

Part-time remote role for a versatile digital marketing and IT specialist with a proven ability to merge technical expertise with creative digital strategies. Skilled in leveraging emerging technologies to drive brand visibility, lead generation, and revenue growth.

Experience:
- Marketing automation platforms.
- CRM Set up and Management
- Lead Generation.
- Lead integrated marketing initiatives.
- Experience in the online/digital marketing/advertising industry.
- Implement innovative marketing technologies and strategies to enhance brand positioning and customer experience.
- Facebook and Instagram ads, Google AdWords.
- Demonstrated ability to work independently and autonomously.

Responsibilities:
As a GoHighLevel expert, your responsibilities would typically include:

Go High Level Platform Setup, maintenance and Customization:
Setting up accounts, workspaces, and pipelines for new users.
Customizing the platform according to client needs, including branding, dashboard configuration, and workflow automation.
Integrating third-party tools and APIs to enhance functionality.

CRM Management:
Managing client relationships through the CRM, including contact segmentation, lead nurturing, and pipeline management.
Automating follow-ups, task assignments, and reminders for efficient workflow.
Monitoring and optimizing sales funnels to improve conversion rates.

Campaign Creation and Management:
Designing and launching marketing campaigns, including email, SMS, and social media.
Setting up and managing landing pages, forms, and surveys.
Implementing lead generation strategies and tracking performance metrics.

Automation and Workflow Optimization:
Creating and optimizing automation workflows for repetitive tasks, lead management, and client communication.
Setting up triggers, actions, and conditions to streamline business processes.
Regularly reviewing and improving automation for efficiency and effectiveness.

Reporting and Analytics:
Generating detailed reports on campaign performance, sales activity, and client engagement.
Analyzing data to provide insights and recommendations for improvement.
Setting up dashboards and KPI tracking for clients.

Training and Support:
Providing training sessions to clients or team members on how to effectively use the platform.
Offering ongoing support for troubleshooting, feature updates, and best practices.
Keeping up with platform updates and educating clients on new features.

Client Onboarding and Retention:
Guiding clients through the onboarding process, ensuring they are comfortable using the platform.
Helping clients achieve their business goals using GoHighLevel, ensuring high satisfaction and retention.
Managing client feedback and incorporating it into the platform’s use to enhance customer experience.

Sales and Marketing Support:
Assisting in the creation of sales funnels and marketing strategies that align with the platform's capabilities.
Collaborating with sales and marketing teams to ensure alignment and effective use of GoHighLevel.

Technical Expertise:
Troubleshooting technical issues and providing solutions to optimize platform performance.
Keeping up-to-date with the latest GoHighLevel features, updates, and industry best practices.
Developing custom solutions or enhancements when necessary.

Project Management:
Managing multiple client projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines and objectives are met.
Coordinating with cross-functional teams to deliver comprehensive solutions.
Documenting processes and maintaining organized records for client accounts.
These responsibilities require a mix of technical expertise, marketing knowledge, and strong client management skills.

THIS WOULD BE A PLUS:
- Lead Generation: execute and optimize online marketing campaigns, including but not limited to social media, marketing, SEO and paid advertising.
- Support website updates and maintenance, create landing pages, ensuring content is accurate, up-to-date, and optimized for SEO.
- Webmaster: maintaining and managing our website and servers to meet user needs. Ensure the functionality, security, and efficiency of web infrastructure while optimizing loading speeds, fixing issues, and updating website content.
- Contribute to the creation and editing of engaging and compelling content for our digital marketing channels, ensuring alignment with our brand and objectives.
- Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, customer preferences, and competitive insights to inform marketing strategies.
- Track, analyze and report the performance of company's marketing campaigns and strategies through evaluating key performance metrics.
- Perform other duties as assigned.

Qualifications:
- CRM integration (Go High Level).
- Expertise in management Go High Level.
- Automations in Go High Level
- Meta & Google Advertising is a plus
- Lead Generation
- Digital Strategy Development
- SEO/SEM Optimization
- Webmaster and Web Analytics
- Data Analysis and Insights
- Marketing Technology Integration
- Cross-functional Collaboration
- IT Solutions Marketing
- Technical Content Creation

title: RE Photo Editor / QC
description:
We are seeking an individual who thrives in a collaborative team environment, demonstrates enthusiasm, and takes initiative. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to provide effective solutions are essential. The ideal candidate should be organized and capable of enhancing our existing systems.

Responsibilities:

Primary responsibility involves meticulously reviewing each image received from our editing house, ensuring consistency and adherence to our brand standards. This entails identifying mistakes or inconsistencies in the editing process to maintain a unified visual style.

If content falls short of our brand standards, the candidate will be required to either send it back with revision requests or make necessary adjustments, including exposure, color correction, cropping, and other enhancements, to ensure a professional and appealing look.

Proficiency in photo editing software such as Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom is a must. A solid understanding of various editing techniques and tools available in these programs is expected.

Effective communication and collaboration with photographers and the scheduling team are crucial. The candidate will closely work with them to comprehend clients' specific requirements, ensuring that the final images align with their vision.

Management and prioritization of a substantial volume of images within tight deadlines is a key responsibility. The candidate should employ efficient workflows and demonstrate strong time management skills to complete editing tasks punctually.

A keen eye for detail is indispensable in identifying and rectifying imperfections or inconsistencies in the images.

Maintenance of an organized file structure and the use of proper naming conventions for edited images are critical. This facilitates easy access, retrieval, and sharing of files with both clients and team members.

Timely and effective response to clients' revision requests is vital for ensuring customer satisfaction.

Required Experience:

Proficient in Photoshop and Lightroom
Exposure blending
Luminosity masks
Layer masking
Color correction and grading
Sky replacement
Virtual dusk

Tuesday - Saturday 6am-2pm EST

title: Data Scientist
description:
As a Data Scientist on our team, you will play a critical role in transforming raw marketing data into valuable strategies. You will work with diverse datasets, extract meaningful insights, and develop models that drive marketing performance. Your expertise in big data, databases, APIs, and data automation will enable you to optimize campaigns, personalize customer experiences, and ultimately contribute to our firm's growth.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Management and Integration: Manage, clean, verify, and integrate various data sources, including:

Listings Data: Handle extensive listings information, including business names, phone numbers, addresses, and descriptions, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
Analytics Data: Collect and analyze marketing analytics from diverse sources, including web analytics platforms, social media, and marketing automation tools.
Looker Integration: Utilize Looker to explore, visualize, and analyze data, generating actionable insights and reports.
Data Extraction and Transformation: Utilize your proficiency in databases and APIs to extract relevant information and transform it into usable formats.

Geolocation Analysis: Leverage latitude and longitude data to gain geographic insights and inform targeted marketing strategies.

Data Automation: Develop and implement automated workflows to streamline data processing, reporting, and analysis tasks.

API Integration: Connect and interact with various APIs to push and pull marketing data, enabling real-time updates and insights.

Marketing Analytics: Analyze campaign performance, customer behavior, and market trends to identify opportunities and optimize marketing efforts.

Model Development: Build and deploy predictive models to forecast customer behavior, personalize recommendations, and enhance marketing effectiveness.

Visualization and Reporting: Create compelling visualizations and reports to communicate findings and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Collaboration: Work closely with marketing teams, IT professionals, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment and achieve data-driven goals.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's or Master's degree: in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Proven Experience: in data analysis, big data technologies, and database management.
Strong Technical Skills: Proficient in Python, R, SQL, and other relevant data analysis tools.
API Expertise: Hands-on experience working with APIs, including RESTful APIs and data integration platforms.
Marketing Analytics Knowledge: Familiarity with marketing metrics, campaign analysis, and customer segmentation.
Looker Proficiency: Experience using Looker for data exploration, visualization, and reporting is a plus.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to analyze complex problems, identify solutions, and implement data-driven strategies.
Excellent Communication Skills: Capable of effectively communicating technical findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Passion for Data: Eagerness to learn and stay updated on the latest data science trends and technologies.

title: Inbound marketing expert
description:
Inbound Marketing Expert

Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly skilled Inbound Marketing Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for attracting, engaging, and converting leads through the development and execution of effective inbound marketing strategies. This role requires a deep understanding of content marketing, SEO, lead nurturing, and data-driven decision-making to optimize the customer journey and drive business growth.

Key Responsibilities:
- Strategy Development: Develop and implement a comprehensive inbound marketing strategy that aligns with business goals and drives qualified traffic to our website.
- Content Marketing: Create, curate, and manage high-quality content (e.g., blog posts, ebooks, whitepapers, case studies, infographics) that educates, informs, and engages our target audience.
- **SEO & SEM:** Optimize content and web pages for search engines to improve organic search rankings and visibility. Manage pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns as needed.
- **Lead Generation:** Develop and manage lead generation campaigns, including landing pages, CTAs, and forms, to capture and convert website visitors into leads.
- **Email Marketing:** Create and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and move them through the sales funnel.
- **Analytics & Reporting:** Track, analyze, and report on key performance metrics (KPIs) to assess the effectiveness of inbound marketing efforts. Provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
- **Marketing Automation:** Implement and manage marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo) to streamline lead nurturing and customer engagement.
- **Customer Journey Optimization:** Continuously improve the customer journey by understanding pain points, optimizing touchpoints, and ensuring a seamless user experience.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with sales, content creators, and other marketing team members to ensure alignment and maximize the impact of inbound marketing efforts.
- **Trend Monitoring:** Stay up-to-date with the latest inbound marketing trends, tools, and best practices to keep strategies innovative and effective.

**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.
- Proven experience as an Inbound Marketing Expert or in a similar role.
- Strong understanding of inbound marketing principles, SEO, and content marketing.
- Proficiency in marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo) and analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush).
- Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills.
- Experience with lead generation, nurturing, and conversion strategies.
- Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
- Knowledge of CRM systems (e.g., Salesforce) is a plus.

**Preferred Skills:**
- Experience in the [Industry of the Company].
- Certification in Inbound Marketing or Digital Marketing.
- Familiarity with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.

**Compensation:** 
- 4/hr

**Application Instructions:** 
Interested candidates should submit their resume, portfolio, and a cover letter outlining their experience and why they are a great fit for this role to [Email Address].

title: Affiliate Marketing Specialist
description:
Come grow with us. 

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Affiliate Marketing Sales Person to join our team as a Virtual Assistant (VA) based in the Philippines. This role is pivotal in driving our affiliate marketing efforts focused on owners of non-USA based language school and social media influencers. This position requires a quick learner who can learn our systems, including Partnero.com (affiliate marketing software), Zagomail.com (email marketing and automation software), and Ninjapipe.com (CRM), Leadscrape.com (to locate potential affiliates). 

The successful candidate will receive paid training during the onboarding process to become proficient in these tools.

Key Responsibilities

1. Affiliate Marketing Management
- Develop and implement effective affiliate marketing strategies to drive sales and increase brand visibility.
- Identify, recruit, and onboard new affiliates to our program.
- Manage and nurture relationships with existing affiliates, providing them with the necessary support and resources.
- Monitor and analyze affiliate performance, generating regular reports and insights to optimize campaigns.
- Ensure compliance with affiliate program terms and conditions.

2. System Proficiency and Management
- Quickly learn and become proficient in Partnero.com, Zagomail.com, and Ninjapipe.com.
- Utilize Partnero.com to manage affiliate relationships, track performance, and optimize campaigns.
- Use Zagomail.com to create and manage email marketing campaigns, including automation workflows.
- Leverage Ninjapipe.com for CRM and additional marketing and sales automation tasks.

3. Campaign Performance Analysis
- Track and analyze the performance of affiliate marketing campaigns using the provided software tools.
- Provide detailed reports on key metrics such as traffic, conversions, and ROI.
- Use insights to optimize future campaigns and improve overall performance.

4. Customer and Affiliate Engagement
- Respond to inquiries and provide support to affiliates in a timely and professional manner.
- Foster a positive and engaging community by encouraging conversations and interactions with affiliates.
- Conduct surveys and polls to gather feedback and insights from affiliates.

5. Collaboration and Coordination
- Work closely with the marketing team to align affiliate marketing strategies with overall business goals.
- Coordinate with graphic designers, content creators, and other team members to ensure cohesive and effective campaigns.
- Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continuously improve strategies and tactics.

Qualifications

- Proven experience in affiliate marketing and sales highly desired.
- We will consider highly motivated applicants with less experience.
- Strong understanding of affiliate marketing platforms and tools.
- Excellent written communication skills.
- Ability to quickly learn and master new software systems.
- Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Familiarity with email marketing and automation software is a plus.

Benefits

- Competitive salary.
- 13th Month salary.
- Paid training during the onboarding process to learn Partnero.com, Zagomail.com, Leadscrape.com, and Ninjapipe.com.
- Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Collaborative and supportive team culture.

About Us

Internexus Los Angeles is where language meets opportunity. Located in the vibrant heart of Los Angeles in Redondo Beach, Internexus LA is dedicated to providing high-quality English language education to students from around the globe. Our mission is to empower individuals with the language skills and cultural understanding necessary to thrive in an interconnected world.

At Internexus LA, we offer a diverse range of programs tailored to meet the needs of our students, whether they are preparing for academic success, professional advancement, or personal enrichment. Our experienced and passionate instructors utilize innovative teaching methods and state-of-the-art resources to create an engaging and supportive learning environment.

Our campus is more than just a place to learn English; it is a community where students can immerse themselves in American culture, make lifelong friends, and achieve their goals. With a focus on personalized attention and a commitment to excellence, Internexus LA is your gateway to mastering the English language and unlocking new opportunities.

Join us at Internexus Los Angeles and start your journey towards a brighter future today.

title: Postilion Payment Switch Development Lead
description:
About the Company
Embrace the future with Novus, market leader in digital payment transformation, headquartered in the dynamic city of Singapore. Our mission is to deliver innovative digital payment solutions, technology, and managed services, enabling our clients to concentrate on their core business while upholding diversity, inclusion, and responsible business practices.
Being a market leader with a strong presence across Asia, we serve leading clients, specializing in Digital Banking—including Agency Banking to promote financial inclusion—Retail Store Automation, and pioneering the digitalization of Retail Fuel Stations.
As we continue to grow and expand our services, we are constantly seeking the right talent to join us on this journey.
About the Role
Role Description
Experienced ACI Worldwide Postilion development lead with a strong background in broader payments architecture within the financial or banking sectors, profound problem-solving abilities, and exceptional communication skills. Familiarity with multi-disciplinary technology, solid understanding of Postilion, able to work with and contribute to a high performing team, and a solid understanding of IT best practices are essential.
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain Postilion applications, ensuring alignment with program specifications and agreed standards.
Prepare and execute unit test cases, address any detected errors, and conduct comprehensive unit testing.
Develop and maintain technical support documentation according to set standards.
Participate in reviews of work outputs and document all work in compliance with organizational standards.
Translate logical designs into component designs considering performance requirements and existing systems.
Contribute to system and program test plans to verify the correct operation of completed systems, documenting and addressing findings.
Collaborate with data analysis and database design colleagues to ensure system designs are integrated and optimized.
Monitor and adhere to organizational standards and project timelines to ensure timely delivery of solutions.
Requirements
In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with Postilion systems, including application support across various platforms.
Minimum 3 years of relevant project implementation experience in banking or processor environments using Postilion.
Proficiency in Java SE, Microsoft SQL Server, and Python with an understanding of advanced SQL queries.
Experience with Windows OS, virtual machines, and a really good grasp of Postilion real-time and office SDK.
Experience with Linux based microservices, kubernetes and CICD principles.
Proficient with EFT protocols, ISO 8583 standards, EMV RTC processing, and cryptographic hardware modules.
Strong analytical skills and experience with ATM, POS, card schemes, and Postilion products like eSocket and POS Portal.
Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
Educational background in BE/BTech/BSc IT/MSc IT/BCA/MCA.
Minimum 4 years of overall experience.

title: WordPress support specialist
description:
About Us
We are a fast-growing digital agency specializing in WordPress website development and maintenance. We pride ourselves on delivering top-notch solutions to our clients and maintaining their websites with the highest standards of quality and security. To support our expanding client base, we are looking for a talented and motivated WordPress Support Specialist to join our team.

Job Description
As a WordPress Support Specialist, you will be responsible for managing and resolving support tickets related to our clients' WordPress websites. This role requires both front-end and back-end development expertise to troubleshoot and solve technical issues efficiently. You will work closely with our development team to ensure seamless website functionality and provide excellent customer service.

Key Responsibilities
* Respond to and resolve WordPress support tickets in a timely and professional manner.
* Troubleshoot and fix website issues, including performance, bugs, and plugin conflicts.
* Assist clients with customization requests, implementing changes to themes and plugins as needed.
* Perform routine website maintenance tasks such as updates, backups, and security checks.
* Work with various WordPress page builders, including Elementor, Divi, WPBakery, and others, to make content and layout changes.
* Collaborate with the development team on more complex issues or new project implementations.
* Provide guidance and support to clients on using their WordPress websites effectively.
* Monitor website performance and optimize for speed and security.
* Document support processes and contribute to the internal knowledge base.

Qualifications
* Proven experience as a WordPress Support Specialist, Developer, or similar role.
* Strong proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end development (PHP, MySQL).
* Extensive experience with WordPress themes and plugins.
* Proficiency in using popular WordPress page builders such as Elementor, Divi, WPBakery, etc.
* Knowledge of SEO best practices and website optimization techniques.
* Familiarity with website hosting environments and DNS management.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical issues to non-technical clients.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively.

Preferred Qualifications
* Familiarity with WooCommerce and other popular WordPress plugins.
* Understanding of website security best practices.
* Basic knowledge of graphic design tools (e.g., Figma) is a plus.

Benefits
* Competitive salary based on experience and skills.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* A supportive and collaborative team environment.

How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, a cover letter detailing their experience with WordPress support, and any relevant portfolio links.

title: Full Time VA
description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant for Airbnb and Booking.com Property Management

Company Overview:
We manage over 10 properties listed on Airbnb and Booking.com, providing exceptional service to our guests and ensuring smooth operations. We are seeking a dedicated Virtual Assistant to join our team and support our growing business.

We Are Looking For Someone Who:

- Is transparent, honest, and willing to communicate openly about any issues or other commitments.

title: OF Texter (adult entertainment industry)
description:
Who we are - our Agency was founded in 2020 and since then we are an established Agency in the OF business, based in Germany. Our agency is like a family and a good place to work, so we value trust and reliability very highly.

Requirements:

We are looking for smart employees who have a high level of motivation, a willingness to work hard, a desire to achieve something and want more from life. Reliability, trust, emotional intelligence and loyalty are the most important qualities that must be present from the beginning. 

You should know the basic functions of the platform, but more importantly, you should understand what the other person is feeling so that you can build a very good conversation and express emotions through text (social competence/intelligence).

General:

If a sale is done successfully you will get a good commission, just like a good salary in general. Good performance is recognised and bonus payments may be made. We pay two times a month, on the 1st and once again in the middle of the month.

We also work with scripts and automation software (CreatorHero) to make things a little easier for you, but that doesn't mean you don't have to put 100 precent effort into the chat! We run a really big professional account and pay high salaries, so we are looking for the best employees. Therefore we expect a good application, everything else will be ignored!

We have 24/7 staffing in three different shifts, with several employees working at the same time: 7AM-3PM (PH time), 3PM-11PM (PH time), 11PM-7AM (PH time). We are currently looking for employees for the 11PM-7AM shift, but our agency is based on performance, so if you can prove yourself you will earn more and get a better shift. When you start with us you will get a professional 1:1 training from us, the training goes on until we are of the opinion that you can handle everything alone and have built up the basic knowledge about the account!

To get in the second round of the application process, you need:
- High-quality application that says a lot about you and your personality/experience
- good english skills (speaking and writing)
- profile picture of you on Telegram
- camera and microphone for a video call
- fast and reliable internet connection
- good/fast laptop or computer

Please send us a message on Telegram how much experience you have with OF-Texting and how many agencies you have been with before. Also how good your English skills are from 1-10. We pay great attention to a good and qualitative application that is NOT written with AI. So the first message decides the whole application process, make sure you explain who you are and why you want this job!

Please note: mention the word „womate“ in your application on Telegram so that we can be sure that you have read our job post up to this point. Please be patient, due to the large number of applications it may take 1-2 days before you receive a response from us.

Contact Telegram:

@womatemanagementjobs

Thank you and good luck!

title: Financial Analyst/Accountant (Real Estate Asset Management)
description:
Company Overview:


We are a dynamic real estate investment and asset management company with a diverse portfolio of residential, commercial, and industrial properties. Our operations span assets managed both in-house and by third-party property managers. We are focused on strategic growth, financial optimization, and long-term value creation. We are seeking a highly skilled Financial Analyst/Accountant with a strong background in real estate finance to join our team and drive our asset management objectives.


Job Description:


As a Financial Analyst/Accountant, you will play a pivotal role in the financial management and strategic oversight of our real estate portfolio. This includes leading the development of consolidated financial reporting, ensuring uniform metrics, and holding both in-house and third-party property management teams accountable. Your responsibilities will also involve supporting refinancing efforts, financing cash-purchased assets, integrating tax planning strategies, and preparing investor reports to keep stakeholders informed.


Key Responsibilities:


Financial Management: Oversee the financial health of the real estate portfolio by developing and maintaining financial models, conducting cash flow analysis, and preparing detailed budgets.

Consolidated Financial Reporting: Lead the creation and management of consolidated financial reports, ensuring consistency and accuracy across all properties, whether managed in-house or by third parties.

Uniform Accountability: Establish and enforce uniform metrics and accountability standards for both in-house and third-party property management teams, ensuring all assets are managed to the highest standard.

Strategic Refinancing and Financing: Collaborate with the asset management team to analyze and execute refinancing strategies, such as transitioning assets to non-recourse loans or securing financing for cash-purchased properties, with the goal of optimizing capital efficiency and supporting long-term growth.

Tax Strategy Collaboration: Work closely with the CPA and the asset management team to incorporate tax planning strategies into the financial management of the portfolio, ensuring compliance and maximizing tax efficiencies.

Performance Monitoring: Analyze the financial performance of all assets, providing insights and recommendations to enhance value and optimize returns across the portfolio.

Investor Reporting: Prepare regular investor reports, detailing financial performance, asset management activities, and strategic initiatives to keep stakeholders informed and engaged.

Reporting and Compliance: Produce regular financial reports, including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements, ensuring all activities comply with U.S. GAAP and relevant regulations.

Strategic Collaboration: Work closely with property managers, bookkeepers, and CPAs to ensure consistent and effective financial management across the portfolio.


Requirements:


Proven experience in financial analysis and accounting within the real estate sector, with a strong focus on portfolio management.

Experience with Buildium property management software or similar platforms.

Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and QuickBooks is required.

Strong understanding of financial modeling, forecasting, and U.S. GAAP.

Proficiency in accounting and bookkeeping practices.

Strong background in both residential and commercial property management.

Proficiency with Microsoft Office 365, including Project, Teams, and Outlook.

Ability to manage financial activities and enforce accountability across both in-house and third-party managed properties.

Experience in preparing investor reports and managing stakeholder communications.

Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.

Strong attention to detail and accuracy.

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Based in the Philippines with a reliable internet connection and a suitable workspace for remote work.


Preferred Qualifications:


Experience with U.S. real estate finance, particularly in non-recourse loans and cash-to-finance strategies.

Expertise in asset management principles, especially in the context of managing a diverse portfolio with multiple management structures.

Background in overseeing the financial aspects of multi-tenant properties and integrating tax strategies into real estate investments.

Familiarity with the EOS (Entrepreneurial Operating System) framework and experience participating in L10 meetings is a plus.


Why Join Us?

Engage in meaningful work on exciting real estate and asset management projects.

Influence key financial strategies, including optimizing capital through refinancing and financing, collaborating on tax planning, and preparing investor reports, across a diverse portfolio.

Competitive salary.

Flexible working hours and the ability to work from home.


Application Process:

Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter. Additionally, please include a video introducing yourself and discussing your experience with real estate finance and asset management. Applications without a video are less likely to be considered.

How to Apply:


Submit your application to hire@kreaiscompanies.com. We are based in Ohio and look forward to welcoming a new member to our asset management team!

title: Operation / Dispatch
description:
A Dispatch and Operations job typically involves managing logistics, coordinating transportation, and ensuring efficient operations within a company. Here's a comprehensive job description for a Dispatch and Operations role:

---

**Job Title:** Dispatch and Operations Coordinator

**Location:** People Trusted Company Group DBA Big Deahl's Movers

**Reports To:** Operations Manager

**Job Summary:**

The Dispatch and Operations Coordinator is responsible for managing daily logistics and transportation activities, ensuring efficient and timely delivery of goods and services. This role requires excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. The coordinator will work closely with drivers, customers, and other departments to ensure smooth operations and high levels of customer satisfaction.

**Key Responsibilities:**

1. **Dispatching:**
- Schedule and dispatch drivers, vehicles, and/or equipment to appropriate locations according to customer requests, specifications, or needs.
- Coordinate and communicate with drivers regarding routes, schedules, and any changes in plans.
- Monitor driver progress and adjust routes as necessary to meet delivery deadlines.

2. **Operations Management:**
- Oversee day-to-day operations to ensure efficiency and productivity.
- Develop and implement operational procedures to improve service quality and efficiency.
- Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and safety standards.

3. **Customer Service:**
- Act as the primary point of contact for customers, addressing inquiries, concerns, and requests promptly and professionally.
- Provide updates to customers on delivery status and resolve any issues that arise during transportation.

4. **Data Management:**
- Maintain accurate records of dispatch activities, vehicle maintenance, and driver logs.
- Prepare and analyze operational reports to identify areas for improvement.

5. **Team Coordination:**
- Collaborate with other departments (e.g., sales, warehouse, customer service) to ensure seamless operations.
- Train and support new dispatch and operations staff as needed.
- Phone and zoom screen driver and labor talent 

6. **Problem Solving:**
- Address and resolve logistical challenges, such as traffic delays, vehicle breakdowns, or route deviations.
- Implement contingency plans to mitigate risks and ensure continuity of operations.

**Qualifications:**

- **Education:** = Bachelor's degree in logistics, business administration, or related field preferred.
- **Experience:** Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in dispatching, logistics, or operations management.
- **Skills:**
- Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Proficiency in dispatch software and Microsoft Office Suite.
- Ability to work under pressure and make quick decisions.
- Knowledge of transportation regulations and safety standards.
- Certifications: Relevant certifications in logistics or transportation management are a plus.

Working Conditions:

- Remote position, zoom meeting and driver interviews will be required
- May require evening, weekend, or on-call hours to address urgent operational needs.

Salary: Hour $4.00 - $5.00 USD

- Competitive salary commensurate with experience and qualifications.
---

To Apply:

Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and qualifications. 
*Complete the steps below. 

1. Change the subject to, I want to work for Gregorio and Bambi.
2. At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.
3. What is the name of the city, county, and state are we based in? IG: bigdeahlsmovers
4. In one short sentence tell me what the difference is in a Class A, and Class C driver and what license is required to drive a 26' box truck? 
5. How many single stacked standards size pallets will fit on the floor of a 26' box truck? 
6. What is an E strap?
7. What is a pallet Jack? 
8. What is OTR? 
9. What is an MEC?
10 What is an MVR?

Make sure to follow all steps above. This is a great job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants that really want the job. If I decide to interview you there will be a short zoom/skype call between us and video will be required. 

Do not write more than what I have asked above, if you write more than what is asked for above, I will ignore your job post. 

**People Trusted Company Group ** is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Quality Control / Photo Editor
description:
We are seeking an individual who thrives in a collaborative team environment, demonstrates enthusiasm, and takes initiative. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to provide effective solutions are essential. The ideal candidate should be organized and capable of enhancing our existing systems.

Responsibilities:

Primary responsibility involves meticulously reviewing each image received from our editing house, ensuring consistency and adherence to our brand standards. This entails identifying mistakes or inconsistencies in the editing process to maintain a unified visual style.

If content falls short of our brand standards, the candidate will be required to either send it back with revision requests or make necessary adjustments, including exposure, color correction, cropping, and other enhancements, to ensure a professional and appealing look.

Proficiency in photo editing software such as Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom is a must. A solid understanding of various editing techniques and tools available in these programs is expected.

Effective communication and collaboration with photographers and the scheduling team are crucial. The candidate will closely work with them to comprehend clients' specific requirements, ensuring that the final images align with their vision.

Management and prioritization of a substantial volume of images within tight deadlines is a key responsibility. The candidate should employ efficient workflows and demonstrate strong time management skills to complete editing tasks punctually.

A keen eye for detail is indispensable in identifying and rectifying imperfections or inconsistencies in the images.

Maintenance of an organized file structure and the use of proper naming conventions for edited images are critical. This facilitates easy access, retrieval, and sharing of files with both clients and team members.

Timely and effective response to clients' revision requests is vital for ensuring customer satisfaction.

Required Experience:

Proficient in Photoshop and Lightroom
Exposure blending
Luminosity masks
Layer masking
Color correction and grading
Sky replacement
Virtual dusk

Monday - Friday 6am-2pm EST

title: Go High Level Experience is a Must!
description:
Location: Remote (Flexible with overlap in EST)

Start Date: September 9

Overview:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant with a strong commitment to faith and leadership. The ideal candidate will excel in managing email campaigns, CRM, and content creation while supporting leadership initiatives. This role requires a high level of English proficiency (9-10) and a proactive approach to problem-solving, with a strong "Guardian" voice to keep tasks on track.


What is GUARDIAN?

A Guardian is someone who is highly responsible, detail-oriented, and values accuracy. They are often cautious, careful, and prefer to take time to ensure things are done correctly. Guardians are reliable and ensure that all tasks are completed to a high standard, making sure that everything aligns with established processes and values. They are great at protecting and maintaining the integrity of a system, organization, or project.

* Title your email application - I am a Guardian!

Key Responsibilities:

Leadership Support:
Assist in coaching sessions by taking notes and delegating tasks to the client.
Keep the client accountable by creating weekly task lists and providing reminders.
Offer candid feedback and help refine processes for better efficiency.

Go High Level Management:
Manage and optimize the Go High Level (GHL) CRM for marketing and client management tasks.
Set up and monitor email campaigns, automations, and client follow-ups.
 
Email and CRM Management:
Efficiently manage the client’s inbox, ensuring all emails are addressed and prioritized.
Maintain and update the CRM system with client interactions and task lists.
Draft and organize email newsletters, ensuring they align with the client’s tone and brand.

Assist in planning and organizing events, ensuring all details are managed effectively.

Content Creation & Social Media:
Create and design content for newsletters, email campaigns, and social media posts using Canva.
Develop content ideas and write compelling copy for various platforms.
Organize and manage social media activities, particularly on LinkedIn using LinkedIn Shield.

Graphic Design:
Design visually appealing graphics for email campaigns, newsletters, and social media.
Utilize Canva for creating professional and engaging content.

Project Management with Asana:
Use Asana to manage tasks, projects, and deadlines efficiently.
Ensure all tasks are completed on time and align with the client’s objectives.

Survey Monkey:
Create, design, and analyze surveys using Survey Monkey to gather valuable feedback.

Qualifications:
God-fearing individual with a strong sense of ethics and leadership.
Fluent in English (9-10) with excellent written communication skills.
Proficient in Go High Level, Gmail, Google Drive, Asana, LinkedIn Shield, and Canva.
Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
Experience in email campaign management, content writing, and social media strategy.
Basic graphic design skills and familiarity with Canva.
Proactive, flexible, and able to work independently with some overlap in EST.
Experience with Survey Monkey is a plus.

How to Apply:
If you are interested in this position, please submit your resume along with a brief self-introduction video (60-90 seconds) explaining why you would be a great fit for this role.

Starting Rate is $5

title: Google Ads – SEO Specialist (Part-Time)

title: Ecommerce developer for automation
description:
Job Opening: Ecommerce Developer for Automation

Location: Remote
Position Type: Full-Time, Long-Term

About Us:
At TeeShoppen, we’re committed to optimizing our daily processes to ensure efficiency and scalability. We believe that no employee should have to complete the same task more than three times in a day – if they do, it’s time to automate it. We’re looking for a talented and experienced Ecommerce Developer with a strong focus on automation to help us achieve this goal.

Role Overview:
As our Ecommerce Developer for Automation, you will be responsible for streamlining and automating our business processes using tools like MAKE.com, Shopify Flows, and other key systems. You will work closely with various teams to identify repetitive tasks and develop automation solutions that improve productivity and reduce manual workload.

Key Responsibilities:

• Identify and analyze repetitive tasks within the company and create automation workflows using MAKE.com, Shopify Flows, and other platforms.
• Develop and maintain integrations between our key systems, including Shopify, MONDAY, Slack, and Google Workspace.
• Ensure all automation solutions are robust, scalable, and aligned with our business goals.
• Monitor and optimize existing automation workflows to ensure they continue to meet business needs.
• Collaborate with team members to understand their workflows and find opportunities for further automation.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest automation tools and technologies to continually improve our processes.

Key Systems We Use:

• MAKE.com
• Shopify
• MONDAY
• Slack
• Google Workspace

Qualifications:

• Proven experience with MAKE.com or Zapier is a must.
• Strong knowledge of Shopify and its automation capabilities.
• Experience with API calls and integrating various software platforms.
• Familiarity with process optimization and workflow automation.
• Ability to work independently and proactively identify areas for improvement.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Why Join Us?

• Be part of a forward-thinking team that values innovation and efficiency.
• Work in a dynamic and flexible environment where your ideas are heard.
• Play a crucial role in shaping the future of our automation strategy.

If you have a passion for automation and want to make a tangible impact on our business, we want to hear from you! Apply now and help us take our operations to the next level.

title: Customer Service Representative for a Global Camping Brand
description:
Contract work (2-6 months) US Timezone Position (12am - 8am PHT) / AU (3am - 11am AEST) Time Zone
Customer Support Team
Junior-Level Agent

—ABOUT JOOLCA

Joolca is a fast-growing e-commerce startup founded by engineering student Maciek Slodyczka. Our small Melbourne-based company centres on a single idea: what if people could enjoy indoor comforts outdoors – no matter where they are?

Our flagship product, the HOTTAP, is the world’s most compact, simple-to-use, portable water heater and has attracted tens of thousands of enthusiastic customers. In the past seven years, we have gone from concept to selling in Australia, New Zealand, USA, UK, and Canada.
To support this growth, we are looking for a remote Customer Support Specialist in the USA timezone.

—SUMMARY

Our Customer Support Specialists become Joolca experts and use this knowledge to quickly and effectively respond to customers via email, chat, and sometimes phone. We take pride in providing a friendly, personalized experience and as such, are also looking for a great communicator who is empathetic, curious, and organized with keen attention to detail.

Folks who succeed in this role are typically resourceful, have the drive to continue to learn, and are great with people (empathetic and understanding).

—RESPONSIBILITIES

- Resolve incoming support requests according to documented processes, meeting SLAs and best practices
- Liaise with our Australian / New Zealand / USA / UK / CA warehouses
- Be active in the ongoing development of product knowledge and support best practices
- Identify and communicate trends in customer feedback
- Identify and communicate improvement opportunities in the customer experience or internal support processes


—MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS

Candidates are expected to possess:
- Strong written and verbal communication skills in English (a must)
- Strong soft skills (empathy, critical thinking, proactiveness, etc)
- Strong typing skills
- Some experience in supporting customers or end-users
- Familiarity with customer support best practices
- Ability to operate autonomously and prioritize your work
- In your application, please include the capital of Turkey
- Ability to work remotely effectively
- A sense of curiosity, a desire to learn & grow within the company
- A team player


—DESIRED EXPERIENCE

- Previous remote work
- Customer Support for E-commerce
- Troubleshooting experience
- Familiarity with tools like Zendesk, Slack, Shopify, Odoo, ClickUp and other eCommerce platforms


—SALARY & BENEFITS

The hourly rate for this contract position is 5 USD.

We believe in the quality of life and in addition to the salary we offer:
- Monthly lunch expense
- A relaxed work environment (you’ll see!)
- Great Culture

—HOW TO APPLY

Please submit:
1. A cover letter, also including a brief write-up about yourself and your interests (be casual and write from the heart)!
2. A short voice clip telling us about your favourite hobby.

Answer these questions:
1. Re-write this sentence fixing any spelling or grammatical errors: "heloo, im looking 2 buy some item. How many qty are in stocks? (Can I by 5 or more)? If I recieve them by tomorrow? And whats total cost to send. Yours, Emrez.

2. Reply to this customer: Hi, please help me! I'm currently out camping and whilst setting up your product to use it, I've realised that I am missing a component. I have not been able to use this yet. Please help, I really need to use this for my trip!
:(

Note: We've noticed an increase in AI usage, which defeats the purpose of getting to know you in the application. Please apply without the use of AI models!

description:
