title: Amazon Account Manager
description:
Job ID: 347542

About VardiCommerce:
VardiCommerce is a dynamic e-commerce company that owns and manages successful brands on the Amazon marketplace. After the successful sale of one of our 7-figure brands, we continue to grow with one existing brand and another currently under development. We are committed to driving growth and innovation, ensuring our brands stand out in the competitive landscape while consistently delivering quality products to our customers. We currently sell exclusively in the USA and Canada.

Role Overview:
As our Amazon Brand Manager, you will play a pivotal role in managing one of our leading brands that sells internationally across the USA and Canada. This position is ideal for a creative thinker with a business orientation, ready to tackle both strategic planning and micro-tasks with equal efficiency. The role starts as part-time with the potential to transition into a full-time position in the near future.

Key Responsibilities:
Oversee the brand's international presence on Amazon, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Listing Management: Manage and optimize listings across all international marketplaces for maximum visibility and sales.
Creating a Listing from Scratch: Craft compelling listings from the ground up, incorporating market research and brand strategy.
SEO Optimization: Implement SEO strategies to enhance product visibility and ranking on Amazon.
Creatives Optimization: Work with creative teams to ensure listing images and content are optimized for conversion.
New Product Launch Strategy: Develop and execute strategies for launching new products, ensuring a strong market entry.
Troubleshooting Suppressed and Stranded Listings: Identify and resolve issues with suppressed or stranded listings to maintain listing health and sales momentum.
Utilize tools such as Amazon Seller Central and Helium10 for data analysis, tracking prices, and monitoring profits.
Work with Google Sheets for data management and reporting.
Collaborate closely with PPC, and logistics personnel, laying the groundwork for future management responsibilities.
Propose and meet ambitious brand growth goals, both short-term and long-term

We are looking for someone who has:
At least 2 years of experience in brand management or a similar role, preferably within an e-commerce or Amazon-focused business.
Experience with ChatGPT is a great advantage.
Demonstrated ability to think creatively and strategically, with a strong business orientation.
Excellent command of English, both written and spoken, with assertive communication and self-confidence.
Ability to work fully remotely, with a high level of trust and autonomy.
Self-starter, eager to provide SMART goal suggestions to the team and successfully execute them that will largely contribute to company growth.




Critical Requirements:
Great attention to details, plus exceptional verbal communication and interpersonal skills
Reliable, takes initiative and finds ways to solve problems independently and with the group if needed

Good to have:
Fluent, confident spoken and written English.
Experience creating listings for Amazon

Team Member Desired Qualities:
More important than abilities – those are the personal qualities that we are looking for in our team members:
Self Starter & able to perform in a fast paced environment: Can learn alone, effectively, and accurately, given information from the internet or other places.
Open, honest and direct about his needs, knowledge, abilities, availability and interests.
Loyal and caring for his workspace and team members.
Smart, Capable and adjusting to a changing environment.
Serious. Wants to be taken seriously and contribute significantly to his workplace. 

Compensation & Benefits:
Competitive hourly rate with potential for a salary increase upon transitioning to full-time.
13th Salary (half a salary every 6 months).
Working remotely with the flexibility to set a schedule that works best for you, monitored via Hubstaff.

PROVIDED:

Access to our full DATA
Access to automation tools
We will work with your schedule to set a calendar in place that works best for you.

HOURS
Part-time initially, with the potential to transition to full-time.
RATE: 
$8/hour (approximately $692/month for part-time)
Php451/hour (approximately Php 39,000/month for part-time)


HOW TO RESPOND:

Please fill out the following form - https://forms.gle/yAmifym1NXxvRLiV9 to apply for the job.
Include the word “watermelon” in your response. Why? This lets us see who is actually paying attention.


Thank you and Good luck! :)

- Comfortable using time tracker tools like Time Doctor
- Highly motivated and organized
- Fluent in English - excellent written and verbal communication
- Proficient on a computer and in Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel)
- High-quality noise-canceling headset
- High-speed internet (50+ Mbps) with backup internet
- High-speed computer with a working webcam also must have a backup computer
- A quiet working environment free of outside noise (cars, animals, others working)

title: Kartra Specialist - Affiliate & Speaking Gig Admin
description:
Do you LOVE all things KARTRA & DIGITAL MARKETING? 

Are you detail oriented, have excellent written English skills and feel confident interfacing with clients via email? 

Do you get excited with creating landing pages, opt in pages, setting up email sequences, building out funnels, etc 

If so, CONGRATS you may have just found your DREAM CAREER POSITION…

The Affiliate & Speaking Gig Admin is a key support position for Big Impact HQ.

Chances are you have experience with SEVERAL CRMs (like Active Campaign, Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) and feel totally confident managing multiple client’s accounts in Karta while taking care of Affiliate & Speaking Gig Logistics as an Admin Assistant

Big Impact HQ specifically works with 7 Figure Women Speakers, managing their affiliate campaigns and speaking gigs to help them fill their events, programs and retreats. You will be responsible for all the admin, logistics, funnel building and email management with our clients and affiliates. 

If you have experience in Customer Service or as an Executive Assistant, plus know Kartra, this position is ideal for you. 

We’re not so much into temporary hookups, nor we’ll treat you as a remedy to this “gap” (position) that we’re trying to fill. We’re in this together for the long run! So if you’re someone looking for a LONG TERM CAREER, here’s the benefits you can earn: 

HMO
PTO
Internet allowance
Generator 
Performance Reviews
...and a LOT more!

If you don’t want a long-term career with growth potential **please do NOT apply**

This is a FULL TIME 40 hours/ week position. 

This is a long term career opportunity, with 13th month and benefits after 90 days of successful performance. In exchange we require an exclusive commitment, no outside project, clients, freelancing or P/T jobs. 

Must be willing to work US hours. You have at least 2 years experience working US hours.

Responsibilities:

Affiliate Launch Management - setting up email sequences, sending manual emails as needed and being forward facing, replying to time sensitive emails with clients & affiliates 
KARTRA CRM database management, email sequence, provide technical support and troubleshooting
Submitting Support tickets, troubleshooting and resolving issues, as needed 
Managing multiple Client’s Affiliate Programs inside KARTRA’s Affiliate Program 
Tracking stats accurately, running reports and providing stats to Client’s 
Speaking Gig Admin - collecting & submitting logistics and docs- sending bio, headshot, talk title, creating offer links, etc 
Updating & scheduling email sequences 
Weekly sweep to make sure all logistics are collected, accurate, links working, etc
Manage Pipeline - research, tracking & following up with leads, ensuring they have a stellar experience every step of the way.
OUTREACH & Follow up with speaking engagements, leads, events, podcasts, etc. You will be in charge of appointment setting and following up with leads.
RESEARCH- creating and adding to list of leads, ensuring list has right type of leads, ensuring all contact info is accurate, etc
Project Management **excellent organization & project management skills is a MUST** ability in prioritizing tasks & projects
Calendar Management- create, manage and streamline CEO’s time and scheduling systems, prioritizing appointments and working directly with executives, customers, and other partners & team members as necessary 
Email Management- reviews and answers email and other inquiries and determines when executive action is required.
Ability to handle confidential information- recognizes and effectively handles proprietary information on a routine basis. Interfaces with various levels of management and clients and customers. 
Filing & Organization Systems- establishes, develops, maintains and updates the filing system for CEO. Retrieves information from files when needed. 

The ideal candidate will:

Know KARTRA inside & out - at least 2 years experience with all kinds of CRMS (ex: Active Campaign, InfusionSoft/ Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) 
Understand Affiliate Marketing, online launches and how to manage it through the Kartra Affiliate Program 
Have excellent time management & project management skills
LOVE tech and know too many tech platforms to list!
Proficient in Gdrive and G Suite
Are a self-starter who thrives in a team environment and is wired to “mark things off the list” and get projects completed ahead of deadlines.
Are comfortable forward facing with Clients, replying to questions via email 
Like routine and knowing what to expect each week, reliable and dependable to get consistent tasks done each week plus manage tasks associated with various projects at the same time.
Are meticulous and detail-oriented - ability to manage A LOT of details, logistics and moving parts at once and double check your work for accuracy 
Demonstrate a solid typing WPM (ideally 45 wpm)
Pride yourself in getting tasks done accurately and efficiently the FIRST time
Excel at creating workflow efficiencies and using tech & automation to save time
Have the ability to SPEAK UP, give feedback and direction to help your CEO stay organized and manage time effectively
Are tech-savvy and proficient in all major platforms
Enjoy leading in a supportive, “behind the scenes” kind of way
Clear, focused, super organized, grounded, efficient, achieve outcomes FAST
Show up & execute, anticipate needs – ability to think 10 steps ahead vs wait for things to be delegated to you
Have a high level of professionalism, grace and business etiquette. Due to the confidential and sensitive nature of information, discretion is a MUST
Are resourceful, proactive & takes initiative
Quick learner & flexibility- ability to engage in a number of detailed tasks at once and handle the demands from the CEO
Have excellent communication skills - ability to work cohesively with different team members and personality types
Committed to RESULTS with great problem solving skills
Excel at getting tasks done accurately and efficiently the FIRST time
Work independently and well with a team
Have the ability to multitask, and work effectively under pressure and deadlines
Take initiative, organize and complete projects with minimal direction and micromanaging

Experience with technology & tools:
At least 2 years experience with all kinds of CRMS (ex: Active Campaign, InfusionSoft/ Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) 
Experienced with Project Management (ex: Asana, Trello, Monday, Clickup)
Experience with Kartra’s Affiliate Program 
Time Doctor (or other time tracking systems)
Gdrive & Gsuite 
Slack 

NEXT STEPS:

If this position sounds like YOU and you’re jumping for JOY at this opportunity, follow these instructions very carefully:

Send your updated resume/CV and cover letter answering the following questions to Hiring@BigImpactHQ.com:

* What attracts YOU to this position & why are you the BEST candidate?
* How many years experience do you have using KARTRA? Do you have experience with the Kartra Affiliate Program, if so how many years? 
* On a scale of 1-10, how detail oriented are you? How do you ensure accuracy with your work? 

**This is no time to be bashful… put your best foot forward and really sell yourself... if you don’t, no one else will ;)

Thanks and GOOD LUCK!

title: Klaviyo Email Marketing Specialist
description:
As a Klaviyo Email Marketing Specialist, you'll play a crucial role in driving our email marketing strategy by designing and executing targeted campaigns that engage and convert our audience. You'll collaborate closely with our team to optimize automated workflows, analyze performance metrics, and refine segmentation strategies, ensuring each campaign resonates with our customers and meets our business goals.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Klaviyo Campaign Execution:
o Design, implement, and manage email marketing campaigns using Klaviyo.
o Customize email templates and workflows to align with customer segments and business objectives.
o Work closely with the Email Marketing Manager to ensure campaign strategies are executed effectively.

2. Automation and Workflow Management:
o Build and maintain automated email workflows in Klaviyo, including welcome series, abandoned carts, and re-engagement campaigns.
o Optimize workflows based on performance data to improve effectiveness and customer experience.

3. Performance Analysis and Reporting:
o Monitor and analyze email campaign performance metrics, including open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.
o Provide detailed reports and insights to the Email Marketing Manager, recommending improvements based on data.

4. Segmentation and Targeting:
o Utilize Klaviyo’s segmentation tools to target specific customer groups based on behavior, demographics, and purchase history.
o Analyze customer data to develop personalized email campaigns that enhance user experience and drive engagement.

5. Content and Design Collaboration:
o Develop compelling email content and design in coordination with designers. 
o Conduct A/B testing on email elements to optimize campaign performance.

6. Compliance and Best Practices:
o Ensure all email campaigns adhere to relevant regulations, such as GDPR and CAN-SPAM.
o Stay informed about the latest email marketing trends and Klaviyo features.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience with Klaviyo in an email marketing role.
• Proven track record of managing and optimizing email campaigns.
• Strong analytical skills and experience with performance reporting.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Proficiency in HTML/CSS for email design is a plus.

title: IT Project Manager & Full Stack Developer
description:
About My Amazon Guy:
My Amazon Guy is a growing digital marketing agency with more than 500+ employees and clients! We are engaging, rewarding, and innovative. Our company’s goal is to grow sales while giving our clients the peace of mind that everything on Amazon is taken care of.

IT PROJECT MANAGER

We are seeking an experienced Project Manager with Scrum certification to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in managing complex projects and leading cross-functional teams using Scrum methodologies. This role requires strong leadership skills, a deep understanding of Scrum principles, and the ability to deliver projects on time and within budget.

Key Responsibilities:
- Lead and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring they are completed on time, within scope, and within budget.
- Facilitate daily stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint reviews, and retrospectives.
- Collaborate with product owners, stakeholders, and team members to define project goals, deliverables, and timelines.
- Ensure the team follows Scrum practices and principles, and continuously improve processes to maximize efficiency.
- Identify, document, and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies.
- Track and report on project progress, metrics, and key performance indicators.
- Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, encouraging continuous improvement and innovation.
- Provide guidance and support to team members, helping them to understand and implement Scrum practices effectively.

Qualifications:
- Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent Scrum certification is required.
- Bachelor’s degree in a related field (e.g., Computer Science, Business, Engineering) or equivalent experience.
- 3+ years of experience as a Project Manager, with a focus on Scrum methodologies.
- Strong understanding of Agile principles and practices.
- Proven ability to manage multiple projects and teams in a fast-paced environment.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.
- Proficiency in project management tools.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work effectively with diverse teams and manage stakeholder expectations.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FULL STACK DEVELOPER

We seek a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, ensuring they perform well and are visually appealing. You will work on both the front-end and back-end, leveraging your expertise in ReactJS, Node.js, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, ExpressJS, and REST APIs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain web applications using ReactJS, Node.js, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, ExpressJS, and REST APIs.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
- Implement security and data protection measures.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems.
- Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
- Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
- Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
- Experience with front-end technologies, particularly ReactJS.
- Proficient in server-side languages, particularly Node.js and ExpressJS.
- Experience with database management using PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design and development.
- Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Strong verbal and written communication skills.

You may follow up on your application by emailing us at recruiting@myamazonguy.com.

title: Zapier Automation Specialist
description:
APPLY HERE: emrgonline.com/careers/#career-form-wrap

About us:
EMRG is an award-winning Digital Marketing Agency based in Los Angeles. With a team of experienced professionals for each service line, we offer a wide range of digital marketing solutions that are customized to meet the unique needs of each client. Monday API and GraphQL

A team player who thrives in a collaborative environment but can also work independently when required.
Experience with Monday.com or any other Project Management tool is preferred
If you are passionate about driving change through automation and are ready to take on a challenging yet rewarding role, we would love to hear from you. Join us in our journey towards operational excellence and be part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to harnessing the power of AI and automation.
Job Type: Full-time

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Role: DevOps Engineer
Contract: Full-time Contractor (160 hours monthly)
Business Hours: 8 AM to 5 PM EST
Rate: Negotiable depending on experience
Availability to Start: April 8, 2024
Additional Info: Additional perks included in the compensation structure 
Tech Stack:
Backend: Java, Javascript, Python, SQL, Linux shell scripts, C#, and Azure DevOps Suite
Frontend: Javascript (ReactJS)
Project Management: Jira and GitHub

Client's Profile

This Canadian-based company aims to empower small businesses and uplift local communities. The company is creating solutions by merging financial technology (Fintech) with digital marketing strategies. This includes a broad spectrum of activities such as billing, payments, advertising, publishing, and marketplace technologies.

What you'll do

This company seeks a seasoned DevOps Engineer to join its dynamic team. The DevOps Engineer will be critical in managing and enhancing our Azure-based environments. This includes taking over an active, transaction-processing serverless application environment currently under development and integrating and reviving a VM and container-based digital marketing application. The successful candidate will ensure seamless SysOps and DevOps operations across our production and non-production environments, automate processes using Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and support our development team by facilitating resource allocation and integration testing.

The essence of the role centers around developing a robust backend platform tailored for financial and digital marketing processes and integrating this platform with a diverse range of partners and suppliers, from financial institutions and affiliates to advertising and marketing entities. As a DevOps Engineer, your role will involve significant engagement with several key areas:
Take over the Azure subscription under the company, encompassing about 40 resources including but not limited to AD B2C, APIM, Key Vaults, Logic Apps, Service Bus, Static Web Apps and Azure SQL.
Document the current state of the Azure environment and maintain ongoing documentation for new changes and updates.
Support the development team with resource allocation, integration testing with partners, and troubleshooting.
Automate the deployment and management processes using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Bicep/ARM templates.
Transitioning a VM and container-based application from another Azure subscription to run alongside existing services in the company environment, ensuring compatibility and operational integrity.
Configure security measures, manage CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Jenkins and execute deployment scripts.
Coordinate with the development team to ensure that all code is properly managed in GitHub and that an active pipeline exists for continuous development and deployment.
Change credentials and access controls to secure our environments from unauthorized access by external teams, as well as manage access for our internal team based on roles.

What you should have

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Azure certifications, such as Azure Administrator or Solutions Architect, are highly desirable.
Proven experience of at least four years in DevOps roles, specifically managing Azure cloud environments.
Strong knowledge of Azure services, including AD B2C, APIM, Azure Functions, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and Azure SQL.
Experience with GitHub for source control and GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of Jenkins is a plus.
Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools, such as Bicep or ARM templates.
Experience with containerization technologies and VM management.
Strong understanding of security best practices in cloud environments.
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
Ability to document processes and maintain clear and accurate documentation.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a remote development team.

Who you are

You are an experienced and self-driven DevOps Engineer with an extensive understanding of Azure principles and best practices. You are ready to step up when necessary and support the team with your knowledge and experience. 
You are passionate about driving innovation and staying ahead of emerging technologies and industry trends. Your insatiable curiosity and dedication to personal growth enable you to introduce cutting-edge ideas and techniques to your team.
You are an exceptional problem solver who navigates complex technical challenges while aligning with business objectives. Your autonomous approach enables you to take ownership of projects, make strategic decisions, and drive successful outcomes.

title: Python Developer
description:
oin Lumenalta in the Philippines - On-Site Opportunity

For over 20 years, our team of 500+ remote professionals has excelled in building strong relationships and delivering career growth. While remote work is our foundation, we’re excited to offer an on-site role in the Philippines, where you’ll work on exciting projects with top clients.

What We’re Working On:
We help big companies launch innovative digital products that reach millions of customers, transactions, and data points. The challenges are real, requiring creativity and determination. We foster a culture that challenges norms, encourages experimentation, and supports personal growth. If you have experience in industries like FinTech, logistics, transportation, insurance, or media, you’ll understand the scale of challenges we face.

This role is based in the Philippines and requires in-office work.

Responsibilities:

Keep data pipelines running smoothly by monitoring, maintaining, and optimizing them.
Identify and fix bottlenecks or inefficiencies in data pipelines.
Solve data-related issues like failed jobs, inconsistencies, or slow performance.
Set up and manage tools to monitor data systems and pipelines.
Spot potential issues early and fix them before they affect production.
Work closely with data engineers, data scientists, and other teams to meet data needs.
Collaborate with development teams to improve and update data systems.
Document and maintain operational guides for common tasks and situations.
Requirements:

7+ years of experience as a Python developer, especially in maintaining critical data pipelines for large enterprises.
Skilled in handling large data sets and using raw SQL.
Experience with Pyspark, AWS, and Databricks.
Proven ability to maintain, troubleshoot, and optimize data pipelines to ensure reliable operations.
Experience in Financial Services is a plus.
Fluent in English, both spoken and written.
Key traits: Detail-oriented, reliable, professional, problem-solver, proactive, passionate, team player.
To demonstrate attention to detail, please list these activities when asked about your favorite pastimes: Art, Traveling, Trekking, Exercising, Nature Hiking, Tennis, Interesting Reading, Organizing, and Networking.
Why Work at Lumenalta?
At Lumenalta, you’ll:

Join a talented and friendly team of senior developers.
Work on projects using the latest technologies.
Support world-class computing infrastructure and data pipelines with cutting-edge tools.
The result? We deliver meaningful results that help our clients break barriers in their industries.

Lumenalta is dedicated to hiring top talent from diverse backgrounds. If you share our values and passion for digital transformation, we encourage you to apply.

title: Software Engineer (Laravel Developer)
description:
To apply, kindly answer this form: https://forms.gle/xUAMFNqbaW9wpPKL6

Culture: Asynchronous, fast-paced, less supervised, international team, proactive 

About KeywordMetrics.com:
KeywordMetrics.com is a leading platform for keyword analysis and search engine optimization (SEO) tools. We provide in-depth data to empower businesses to optimize their online presence and drive organic traffic. Our team is dedicated to building innovative solutions that meet the dynamic needs of the digital marketing landscape. Sister company of Embarque.io

Job Overview:
We are seeking an experienced Laravel Developer to join our remote team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in PHP and the Laravel framework, with the ability to work independently and deliver high-quality code. You will be responsible for implementing new features, optimizing existing ones, and ensuring the robustness of our platform as it scales.

Key Responsibilities:

Feature Development:
Implement new features based on the outlined milestones, including automated email reports, customizable time ranges, and enhanced keyword filtering.
Develop a settings page allowing users to opt-in for weekly email reports and customize their content.

Data Management & Integration:
Extend the existing data management system to support indexing old data for comparison purposes, crucial for tracking changes over time.
Work with Google Search Console and Google API to fetch data and implement filters allowing users to inspect different time ranges (e.g., Today, Last 30 days, Last 60 days, Last year).

Bug Fixing & Optimization:
Improve the accuracy of keyword filters by identifying and correcting failure cases.
Address minor fixes such as displaying total page traffic in the UI and adding tooltips to filters for user guidance.

Code Quality & Collaboration:
Write clean, simple, and efficient code following best practices.
Ensure all code is thoroughly tested and documented.
Collaborate asynchronously with the team, handling pull requests and providing feedback where necessary.

Tech Stack:
Backend: PHP, Laravel
Frontend: TailwindCSS, AlpineJS
Infrastructure: Laravel Forge
API & Data: Google Search Console, Google API

Required Qualifications:
Experience:
Minimum of 3 years working with Laravel.
Proven experience with PHP and developing scalable web applications.
Familiarity with Laravel Forge, TailwindCSS, and AlpineJS is highly desirable.
Experience working with Google APIs and integrating third-party services.

Skills:
Strong understanding of software development principles.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Effective communication skills for remote collaboration.
We focus on experience and skills! 

Nice to Have:
Familiarity with SEO and keyword analysis tools.
Experience working in an asynchronous remote environment.
Contributions to open-source projects.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible working hours with the option to work remotely from anywhere.
Opportunity to work on innovative projects in a fast-paced environment.
Collaborative and supportive team culture.

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.
- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.
- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Customer Service Representative (CSR)
description:
Seeking a professional, Customer Service Representative (CSR) with excellent verbal and friendly customer service skills. This CSR position will interact with different customers to handle inbound inquiries and answer service calls.

***FLUENT ENGLISH IS REQUIRED***

***MUST HAVE A QUIET SPACE TO WORK***

***MUST HAVE RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE & DIRECTLY PLUGGED INTO YOUR MODEM.***

***DUAL MONITORS ARE REQUIRED***

***PLEASE INCLUDE A RECORDING INTRODUCING YOURSELF AND A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF YOUR EXPERIENCE.***

***PLEASE INCLUDE A VIDEO OR PHOTO OF YOUR HOME OFFICE SETUP DETAILS.***

Requirements:

- Working hours: Must have OPEN availability. Saturdays and Sundays open availability is a must!
- Previous phone customer support or answering service experience
- High attention to detail and strong organizational skills
- Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
- Ability to MULTI-TASK in FAST-PACED environment, including phone and email support
- Great customer service personality and upbeat attitude
- Ability to work independently while managing multiple projects and with minimal supervision

As a Customer Service Representative, you will serve as the first point of contact for a variety of different customers handling a wide array of requests. With incoming phone calls, you will handle different requests based on the specific client’s scripts and instructions. Whether you assist in scheduling a service, processing a payment, or taking a message, you will make each customer interaction a successful positive call.

We work in a team atmosphere that strives to meet the CA call center’s goals each month. Your computer skills, problem-solving, and commitment to creating an awesome interaction experience will ensure your success!

title: Executive Admin
description:
Join a dynamic and innovative company that empowers entrepreneurs, particularly women, in real estate investing and wealth-building strategies. We offer comprehensive resources, including educational programs, coaching, and community support, to help individuals achieve financial independence. Focusing on actionable insights and practical tools, we are dedicated to guiding our members through every step of their entrepreneurial journey, from initial investment to long-term success.
We are seeking a versatile and proactive Virtual Assistant who can support various aspects of our operations. This role involves content management, customer support, event coordination, digital product management, administrative support, financial administration, and market research. The ideal candidate will have a strong ability to multitask, excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others succeed.


Roles and Responsibilities:

Content Management
• Schedule Social Media Posts: Create and maintain a content calendar, scheduling posts across various social media platforms.
• Content Editing and Proofreading: Review and edit social media posts, blog articles, and digital product materials for accuracy and consistency.
• Content Coordination: Collaborate with content creators and designers to ensure timely delivery of content.
• Video Editing: Edit videos for social media and digital product materials.

Customer Support
• Customer Inquiry Handling: Respond to customer inquiries across social media, email, and other platforms. Provide information about courses, mentorship programs, masterminds, and conferences.
• Customer Relationship Management: Maintain a CRM system to track customer interactions and feedback, ensuring customer satisfaction and addressing any issues.

Event Coordination
• Event Planning and Logistics: Assist in organizing online and in-person events, handling venue bookings, travel arrangements, and other logistical details.
• Attendee Management: Manage attendee registrations, send out reminders, provide support during events, and coordinate with speakers and sponsors.
• Graphic Design: Create visual assets for event promotions and materials.

Digital Product Management
• Course and Mentorship Program Coordination: Assist in the creation and updating of course materials and mentorship resources, and manage online platforms for delivering digital products.
• Sales and Promotion: Support marketing efforts to promote courses, mentorship programs, and events, while tracking sales and performance metrics.
• Go High Level (CRM and Marketing Automation): Utilize Go High Level for CRM management and funnel design.
Administrative Support
• Email and Calendar Management: Manage the influencer's email inbox and calendar, scheduling meetings, calls, and appointments.
• Document Preparation and Organization: Prepare reports, presentations, and other documents, while organizing and maintaining digital and physical files.

Financial Administration
• Invoicing and Payments: Handle invoicing for digital products and events, tracking and managing payments and expenses.
• Budgeting and Financial Reporting: Assist in budget planning and financial reporting for various projects.
Market Research and Analysis
• Audience Insights: Conduct research to understand audience preferences and trends, and analyze social media engagement and feedback to inform content strategy.
• Competitor Analysis: Monitor competitors and industry trends to identify opportunities and threats.

Miscellaneous Tasks
• Brand Representation: Represent the influencer's brand professionally in all communications and interactions.
• Continuous Improvement: Suggest and implement improvements to processes and workflows.

Qualifications:
• Proven experience in a similar role, preferably in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
• Strong communication, organizational, and multitasking skills.
• Proficiency in content creation, social media management, video editing, and CRM systems (preferably Go High Level).
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a proactive and problem-solving mindset.
• Attention to detail and commitment to quality in all tasks.

How to Apply: If you are passionate about empowering others and have the skills and experience required, we would love to hear from you. Please apply at this link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScPnyfp9ugkDbb2jAN9wMCCCsdCocjo0VH_Zr0Z1Ge3USKM_A/viewform

title: IT Service Dispatcher / Tier 1 Helpdesk Job Description
description:
*Job Posting: IT Service Dispatcher*
*Location:* Work from Home (Remote)
*Shift:* Monday to Friday, 5am-1pm Pacific Standard Time (PST), US
*About Us:*
We are a leading Managed IT Service Provider based in Portland, Oregon. We pride ourselves on delivering efficient and professional IT support to our clients. As we continue to grow, we are looking to expand our team with dedicated and enthusiastic IT professionals.

Position Overview: The IT Service Dispatcher / Tier 1 Helpdesk role is a dual-function position responsible for managing and dispatching service requests to appropriate IT personnel while providing first-line technical support to users. This role ensures the timely and efficient resolution of IT-related issues, prioritizes service requests, and maintains a high level of customer satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities:
Service Dispatching:
Receive, log, and manage incoming service requests via phone, email, or ticketing system.
Assess the urgency and complexity of each request and assign it to the appropriate IT technician or team.
Monitor the status of open tickets and ensure timely resolution by following up with technicians and users.
Maintain accurate records of service requests, actions taken, and resolutions in the ticketing system.
Tier 1 Helpdesk Support:
Provide first-line technical support to end-users, including troubleshooting hardware, software, and network-related issues.
Assist users with password resets, software installations, and basic IT inquiries.
Escalate more complex issues to Tier 2 or Tier 3 support when necessary, providing detailed documentation of the issue.
Educate users on basic IT practices, such as data backup, cybersecurity, and proper use of IT resources.
Customer Service:
Serve as the primary point of contact for IT-related inquiries, ensuring a positive customer experience.
Communicate effectively with users to understand their issues and provide clear instructions and updates.
Manage customer expectations by providing realistic timelines and follow-up on unresolved issues.
Documentation and Reporting:
Document troubleshooting steps and solutions in the knowledge base for future reference.
Generate reports on service request trends, response times, and customer satisfaction.
Contribute to the development and improvement of IT processes and procedures.
Coordination and Collaboration:
Work closely with other IT team members to coordinate the resolution of issues and share knowledge.
Participate in team meetings and training sessions to stay updated on new technologies and procedures.
Other Duties:
Perform other related duties as assigned by the IT Manager or Operations Manager.
Continuously seek to improve technical skills and knowledge through training and certifications.

Qualifications:
* Experience:
* 1-2 years of experience in a technical support or dispatch role.
* Experience with IT service management (ITSM) tools and ticketing systems.
* Skills:
* Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Basic understanding of IT concepts and troubleshooting techniques.
* Proficiency in using ITSM tools and software (e.g., HaloPSA, ConnectWise, ServiceNow, Jira, Zendesk).


*How to Apply:*
Interested applicants are requested to email their updated resume along with a brief cover letter and video intro detailing their relevant experience to joyce@bytagig.com. Please use the subject line: "IT Service Dispatcher - [Your Full Name]".
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We appreciate your interest and thank all applicants in advance.

title: Airbnb Virtual Asssistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our growing Airbnb business. The team is growing and we need another assistant for our evening shift. This remote position is essential to ensuring seamless operations and exceptional guest experiences. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing communications with guests, coordinating with cleaning and maintenance staff, and maintaining an efficient workflow. We value hardworking individuals who exhibit excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English.

Key Responsibilities:

Guest Communication:

- Promptly respond to guest inquiries and messages in a professional and hospitable manner.
- Manage booking requests, process reservations, and handle any changes or cancellations.
- Provide guests with clear instructions and helpful information regarding their stay, including check-in/out procedures, house rules, and local recommendations.

Scheduling and Coordination:

- Organize and schedule cleaning services before and after guest stays, ensuring the property is always in pristine condition.
- Coordinate with handymen or maintenance personnel for any necessary repairs or upkeep, arranging appointments that do not interfere with guest stays.
- Keep track of inventory and reorder supplies as needed, liaising with suppliers and managing deliveries.

Administrative Tasks:

- Maintain organized records of bookings, payments, and expenses.
- Assist in managing the Airbnb listing, updating availability, and ensuring the accuracy of information and photos.
- Provide regular reports on guest feedback, occupancy rates, and other relevant metrics.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

- Fluency in English: Must possess excellent command of the English language, both written and spoken, for clear and effective communication.
- Detail-oriented: Strong attention to detail to ensure accuracy in all aspects of the role.
- Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently and effectively, prioritizing as necessary.

Experience: Prior experience with Airbnb/VRBO/Booking.com is preferred

- Tech-Savvy: Proficient in using communication tools (e.g. email, messaging apps).
- Problem-Solving: Capable of handling unexpected situations or guest requests with professionalism and composure.

Preferred Experience: Please call out if you've used any of these softwares previously
- Hospitable
- Pricelabs
- Booking.com
- VRBO
- Canva

Additional Information:

- This is a remote position
- This job requires a minimum of 40 hours/week
- The schedule is from 3:30pm - 11:30pm EST Wednesday - Sunday
- This job must be your ONLY job

title: Web Developer
description:
Click here to apply: emrgonline.com/careers/#career-form-wrap

EMRG is an award-winning Digital Marketing Agency based in Los Angeles. With a team of experienced professionals for each service line, we offer a wide range of digital marketing solutions that are customized to meet the unique needs of each client. As our company continues to grow, we are also committed to expanding our philanthropic goals and supporting children in need worldwide.

The candidate we are looking for needs to be extremely honest, trustworthy, and hard-working. Someone who loves learning and is not afraid to take on new tasks.

title: Creative Director | SMM - BONUSES
description:
I’m looking for an extremely creative team member to take up our most important role and help with creating social media strategies and managing our team of creatives. Hours will be around 9am to 2pm CST.

Candidates MUST BE organized and have experience in leadership, Social Media Management, online marketing, video creation and graphic design.

There will be tutorials for you or I will provide you with course material if needed to help level up your experience.

Your Top Tasks:
***Creative Direction***
- Manage and direct video editors and graphic designer to bring out the best content and make sure they stay on brand that you help develop.
- Review, revise and approve content of creative team

***Project Management***
- You will help make sure that the team stays up on quality and delivers on time.
- Help create Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) so the team can be efficient but keep quality.
- Manage Project Management tools such as Trello, Slack, Discord and Monday

****Social Media Management***
- Schedule content that the team has created for you
- DM Management & engagement
- Copywriting -- You will help create descriptions for content that capture attention and retention
- Creating social media strategies and campaigns
- Use 3rd party apps/software's like ManyChat for automations
- Analytic Tracking

Job Requirements:
*Strong leadership skills
* Soft skills and client communication.
* Well-versed with social media and online marketing campaigns
* Experienced in Premier Pro, Adobe After Effects, and Photoshop (prepare to show work if chosen for next steps)
* Must understand story telling
* Willing to work during hours listed above.
* Have smart phone and laptop with good internet connection
* Prior experience in a similar role is a plus
* Critical thinker and problem solver
* Good communication skills
* Speak great English
* Detail oriented and organized
* Passionate about marketing and creative

Perks:
-I’m very patient, understanding and easy to work with
- I'm huge on company culture and love to take care of my people.
-Flexible Vacation, if you need time off just let me know
-Opportunity to get bonuses, if you exceed my expectations.
-When we grow, you grow> I’m looking for someone who will be in the business with me long term.
-You will have access to VidLead Studio which is a software made with Go High Level.

Pay:
-You will will immediately have the opportunity to get bonuses.
-You will be paid on the 15th and the 30th of every month or the last day if it's below 30.
-You will get incremental raises over time based on growth.

Quick About me:
I have been doing videography and editing for 10+ years, and entrepreneurship/marketing for 8 years. I’ve helped people grow their social media on YouTube and Instagram. I live in Texas and am focused heavily on my work and growth within the business. I own a creative agency where we help our clients grow and get more business at the same time. We focus on quality and mainly work on educational short form videos, podcasts and Video Ads.

To Apply for the Job, send numerically and with bullet points or "*" so it's easier for me to read:
1. Change the subject line to “I am intentional [Insert the name of the CEO of VaynerMedia here]”
2. What is my job title? (Check @ricosayan Instagram)
3. (Label this answer 1.) At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.
4. (Label this answer 2.) Below that tell me what experience you have that may be suitable for this position, and what jobs you’ve worked in the past. This should be no more than 5 sentences.
5. (Label this answer 3.) Can you work the hours I listed above?
6. (Label this answer 4.) Answer number 2 at the end (job title question).

Make sure to follow all the steps above. This is a great job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants that really want the job. If I decide to interview you there will be a short zoom call between us and video will be required.

Do not write more than what I have asked you above, if you write more than what is asked for above I will ignore your job post.

Thank you,
Emmanuel Sayan

title: Bilingual Virtual Assistant (English/Spanish)
description:
POSITION: Bilingual Virtual Assistant (English/Spanish) 

JOB SUMMARY: Bilingual Virtual Assistant (English/Spanish) is the first point of contact for patients at the Practice. In this position, you will be responsible for answering the phones, scheduling appointments, completing administrative processing and record keeping. The VA will be able to answer questions regarding advertising promotions; screen customers to determine what services will meet their needs and demonstrate excellent customer service. The position supports the mission of the practice by demonstrating excellent customer care and incorporating telemarketing and customer retention calls as needed.

QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE:
- FLUENT IN ENGLISH AND SPANISH (this is non - negotiable)
- 5+ years of customer service, preferably in a medical setting.
- Professional and friendly in the work environment
- Efficient with computers, Microsoft word, scheduling software and Excel.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Outstanding problem-solving and organizational abilities.
- Strong analytical skills to be able to foresee potential challenges and solve
- Business owner mentality
- Neat, professional appearance

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Retrieves phones messages and prioritizes return phone calls.
- Answers incoming calls and guides patient and customers to the appropriate service.
- Scheduling appointments to meet practice monthly new patient goal
- Obtains appropriate patient information including new patient information, referral insurance information, Patient Portal and HIPAA information for all patients.
- Schedules appointments using standardized procedures
- Reviews patient records daily.
- Confirm that next day appointment reminders have been reviewed and updated
- Tracks referral source and PCPs for all patients 100% of the time
- Manage clinic flow
- Completes scanning as necessary
- Prepares daily, weekly and monthly reports as directed.
- Performs all other miscellaneous duties as assigned.
• Exercises confidentiality as it relates to all business and patient information.
• Maintains and is responsible for the performance in the areas of accounts receivable and/or accounts payable.
• Can independently manage and execute A/R responsibilities.
• Creates or executes financial reports as needed.
• Processes and files insurance claims, including submitting appropriate information to the insurance carriers within 2 business days of service rendered date.
• Requests third party prior authorization as needed.
• Assists patients with insurance related problems, questions, or concerns.
• Designs and executes collection processes including creating efficiencies as needed.
• Posts charges and payments in the accounting system within 2 business days of receipt.
• Trains and / or supports Office Staff members as needed.
• Submits appropriate information to the insurance carriers, and requests third party prior authorization as needed.
• Processes responses or requests from insurance companies within 5 business days of receipt.
• Works with insurance, or other agencies to facilitate authorizations and benefit verification.
• Generates customer bills after receiving Explanation of Benefits information from the insurance carriers.
• Re-issues bills if account is 30 days overdue.
• Contacts customers who have accounts that are 60 days overdue and may initiate collections procedure.
• Maintains petty cash fund.


Other duties
- Retrieves phones messages and prioritizes return phone calls within 1 business date.
- Send out imaging orders
- Prepares daily, weekly and monthly reports as directed.
- Creates new reports according to the needs of the practice.
- Answers Medicare, private insurance, and other insurance questions for customers.
- Other duties as assigned


Personal Attributes
- Demonstrate excellent customer service to patients, internal and external customers
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Can handle a multitude of tasks simultaneously; able to prioritize duties
- Ability to be flexible and multi-task
- Work independently
- Willingness to innovate and improve processes
- Takes personal responsibility for professional development
- Professional conduct and attitude
- Committed to performance and a work environment consistent with the Arizona Hearing Center Strategic Objectives and Employee Manual
- Committed to collaborative hearing care
- Committed to a culture of continuous quality improvement
- Follows the current systems and a willingness to continually improve the organization’s systems
- Uses the practice resources judiciously
- Time management to allow for prioritizing multiple duties with various deadlines


Typical Physical Demands:
Work may require sitting for long periods of time, and stooping, bending, and stretching for files and supplies. Employee will occasionally be asked to lift files or paper weighing up to 30 pounds. Position requires manual dexterity enough to operate a keyboard, operate a computer, telephone, copier, and such other office equipment as necessary. Vision must be
correctable to 20/20 and hearing must be in the normal range for telephone contacts. Position also requires viewing computer screens and typing for long periods of time and working in an environment that can be very stressful.

ENVIRONMENTAL/WORKING CONDITIONS:
Work can sometimes be performed in the reception area and involves frequent contact with patients. Work may be stressful at times. Interaction with others is constant and interruptive.


ACKNOWLEDGEMENT STATEMENT: I have read this job description and I completely understand all my job duties and responsibilities. I am able to perform the essential functions as outlined with or without reasonable accommodation. I understand that my job may change on a temporary or regular basis according to the needs of the organization without it being specifically included in the job description. If I have any questions about job duties not specified on this description that I am asked to perform, I should discuss them with my immediate supervisor.
I have discussed any questions I may have had about this job description prior to signing this form.

To apply for this role:
Please reply with the link to your resume and a 5 minute or less video in SPANISH explaining why you would be the ideal candidate at ea@azhear.com

QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE:
- FLUENT IN ENGLISH AND SPANISH (this is non - negotiable)
- 5+ years of customer service, preferably in a medical setting.
- Professional and friendly in the work environment
- Efficient with computers, Microsoft word, scheduling software and Excel.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Outstanding problem-solving and organizational abilities.
- Strong analytical skills to be able to foresee potential challenges and solve
- Business owner mentality
- Neat, professional appearance

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Retrieves phones messages and prioritizes return phone calls.
- Answers incoming calls and guides patient and customers to the appropriate service.
- Scheduling appointments to meet practice monthly new patient goal
- Obtains appropriate patient information including new patient information, referral insurance information, Patient Portal and HIPAA information for all patients.
- Schedules appointments using standardized procedures
- Reviews patient records daily.
- Confirm that next day appointment reminders have been reviewed and updated
- Tracks referral source and PCPs for all patients 100% of the time
- Manage clinic flow
- Completes scanning as necessary
- Prepares daily, weekly and monthly reports as directed.
- Performs all other miscellaneous duties as assigned.
• Exercises confidentiality as it relates to all business and patient information.
• Maintains and is responsible for the performance in the areas of accounts receivable and/or accounts payable.
• Can independently manage and execute A/R responsibilities.
• Creates or executes financial reports as needed.
• Processes and files insurance claims, including submitting appropriate information to the insurance carriers within 2 business days of service rendered date.
• Requests third party prior authorization as needed.
• Assists patients with insurance related problems, questions, or concerns.
• Designs and executes collection processes including creating efficiencies as needed.
• Posts charges and payments in the accounting system within 2 business days of receipt.
• Trains and / or supports Office Staff members as needed.
• Submits appropriate information to the insurance carriers, and requests third party prior authorization as needed.
• Processes responses or requests from insurance companies within 5 business days of receipt.
• Works with insurance, or other agencies to facilitate authorizations and benefit verification.
• Generates customer bills after receiving Explanation of Benefits information from the insurance carriers.
• Re-issues bills if account is 30 days overdue.
• Contacts customers who have accounts that are 60 days overdue and may initiate collections procedure.
• Maintains petty cash fund.


Other duties

- Send out imaging orders
- Prepares daily, weekly and monthly reports as directed.
- Creates new reports according to the needs of the practice.
- Answers Medicare, private insurance, and other insurance questions for customers.
- Other duties as assigned


Personal Attributes

Typical Physical Demands:
Work may require sitting for long periods of time, and stooping, bending, and stretching for files and supplies. Employee will occasionally be asked to lift files or paper weighing up to 30 pounds. Position requires manual dexterity enough to operate a keyboard, operate a computer, telephone, copier, and such other office equipment as necessary. Vision must be
correctable to 20/20 and hearing must be in the normal range for telephone contacts. Position also requires viewing computer screens and typing for long periods of time and working in an environment that can be very stressful.

title: BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist - Full-Time Remote Position
description:
We are seeking a driven BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist to join our team. This role involves two main responsibilities: cold calling medical practices to pitch our client’s digital marketing services and generating leads by scraping data from platforms like Zocdoc. You will play a key role in expanding our client base and identifying high-potential prospects in the medical field.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Cold Calling and Sales Outreach:
Make outbound calls to medical practices to pitch our digital marketing services.
Effectively communicate the benefits of our services and convert interest into booked calls.
Aim to book a minimum of 5 qualified calls per week, with bonuses awarded for reaching this target. 
Maintain accurate records of all call outcomes and follow-ups in Salesforce.
2. Lead Generation and Data Scraping:
Access Zocdoc and other platforms to identify and scrape leads for medical practices by specialty and location, excluding those based on insurance.
Avoid hospitals, universities, and practices without a dedicated website.
Use Google Ads and the Facebook Ads Library to identify practices that are spending on digital marketing.
Cross-reference all new leads with existing records in Salesforce to avoid duplication and ensure lead quality.
Document all new and qualified leads in Google Sheets, clearly noting whether they are untouched prospects.
3. Data Management and Reporting:
Keep meticulous records of all generated leads and call activities in Google Sheets and Salesforce.
Provide regular reports to the team, detailing lead quality, call outcomes, and conversion rates.
4. Focus on High-Potential Targets:
Prioritize targeting enterprises, doctor groups, and multi-specialty clinics.
Example targets include Circle Medical, Salience Health, and other specified practices and groups.

Tools and Resources Provided:
VPN: For accessing tools and data securely.
Zocdoc: For identifying and scraping leads.
Google Ads and Facebook Ads Library: To identify marketing spend.
Salesforce: For cross-referencing leads and managing data.
Excel/Google Sheets: For tracking and documenting new leads.

Ideal Candidate Profile:
Experience in B2B sales, cold calling, or lead generation.
Familiarity with Salesforce, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads Library.
Strong English communication skills with a clear, neutral accent.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet daily and weekly targets.

Compensation:
Competitive hourly rate of $5/hour.
20% Bonus for every 5 booked calls and successful lead conversions.

How to Apply:
If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with experience in sales and lead generation, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume to davidcho02@g.ucla.edu with the subject line "B2B Sales Specialist - (NAME)". In the email, please provide 3 prospective medical practices you've found and explain the rationale why you chose them. 

Interview Process:
We will conduct a large Zoom interview to evaluate your English accent, comprehension, and ability to communicate effectively. Selected candidates will be given a sample task to assess their skills further.

title: Executive assistant to the CEO
description:
We are looking for a proactive, allround executive assistant with strong technical and marketing skills.
Who are we:

We are a software agency based in the UK and UAE, building apps for Startup founders around the world. We have a fully remote setup. We are a small but growing team - where delivering quality to our clients is the #1 priority and have an open and informal team culture based on trust and transparency.

Who you’ll be working with:

You’ll be working closely with our founders and management team, making sure they can focus on what they do best.

How we define your success:
The founder is on top of deadlines, the founder has time to focus 
You have a list of problems you prevented, rather than a list of problems you solved

Typical Things on your plate:

Marketing Support:
Content Creation: Draft and post content on LinkedIn, Twitter, and other forums. This includes creating visuals, formatting posts, and engaging with followers by responding to comments.
Social Media Monitoring: Track post analytics. Keep an eye on relevant communities, identifying opportunities to engage and be visible.
Operations:
Invoicing and Bookkeeping: Prepare and send invoices, reconcile payments using Xero, and follow up with clients on outstanding payments (SOP provided).
Client Communication: Handle email correspondence, keeping the founders’ inbox organized and ensuring timely responses.
Calendar Management: Keep track of scheduling, rescheduling, and any time-sensitive tasks to ensure everything runs smoothly.
Client Onboarding: Guide new clients through the onboarding process, set up necessary tools like ClickUp to ensure a smooth start.
General Admin Support:
Reminders and Follow-ups: You are excellent at managing your tasks. You take notes during meetings and ensure that follow-up tasks are completed.
Task Management: Use ClickUp to track and manage tasks, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks.
SOPs and Automation: Update standard operating procedures (SOPs) as needed and identify opportunities to automate tasks using tools like Zapier or Make.com.
Candidate Screening: Review incoming resumes, shortlist candidates for technical roles, and assist in coordinating interviews.
Personal Assistance:
Bills and Payments: Handle personal tasks like paying bills, making regular transfers, and ordering items online.
Travel and Research: Assist with booking travel, researching personal projects, and handling other miscellaneous tasks that might come up.
To succeed in this role, you most likely have:
Experience in emptying out the plate of tasks founders/CEO’s
Super strong English communication skills
Dares to ask questions
Discretion – we work with highly sensitive information
Superhuman organization skills
Business acumen – you understand the agenda of the management team and know what to prioritize
Flexibility & adaptability
Proactive approach – don’t wait for someone to give you a task, but ask ‘what can I take off your plate?’
Working hours that overlap with GST timezone

What is in it for you:
A key role in a young and dynamic team that is changing the future of our clients
Working closely with 2 complementary founders
Working with in a open, supportive and positive team culture
A setting where initiative is appreciated and rewarded

Benefits
· Competitive salary
· Training budget and time
· Working hours: Our regular working hours are 8am GST- 6pm. 
We’d like for you to triage all email before 6am GST. 
We normally post content at 6pm GST
Other working time is flexible – you set your own work rhythm, with the only requirement that at least 60-70% of your standard work hours fall between 8am-6pm GST and meeting times are respected and you are available on Slack for quick turnarounds.
Application process
Click the link to complete the application form - https://forms.clickup.com/6626316/f/6a70c-46291/P96SAWOTV5NY5UMFB3
We’ll review your application and share with you a test task to complete
Upon successful completion of the test tasks, you will be invited to interview with the management team

title: Hubspot Integration Specialist
description:
Please read the job posting carefully. 

We are looking for a Hubspot Integration Specialist who will join our team. As the HubSpot Integration Specialist, your primary role will be to create and manage HubSpot sub-accounts for the clients. This includes optimizing the internal HubSpot account and supporting client accounts by building workflows, automation, and reports. Your expertise will directly impact our client's operational efficiency, data accuracy, and overall satisfaction with the company's services.

Responsibilities:

1) CRM Management:
- Set up new HubSpot sub-accounts for TFM Digital’s clients, including full migration of data from previous CRMs.
- Develop and configure client-specific pipelines and automation frameworks within their HubSpot sub-accounts.
- Manage user setup, including the integration of emails, phone systems, and calendars within each client sub-account.
- Create and manage meeting links to facilitate seamless scheduling and communication for clients.

2) Reporting Hub:
- Design, create, and update comprehensive dashboards and reports for client sub-accounts to support business analytics.
- Perform regular data cleaning to maintain up-to-date and accurate records across pipelines and contacts in client accounts.
- Set up and manage sales forecasts, goals, and analytics within each client’s HubSpot sub-account to track performance metrics.

3) Marketing Hub:
- Utilize Marketing Hub Plus to drive marketing initiatives for clients, including campaign setup and tracking within their sub-accounts.
- Set up email workflows using prewritten content triggered by form fills and other user actions in client accounts.
- Create and manage website forms within client sub-accounts to capture and convert leads effectively.

4) Content Hub:
- Use HubSpot’s Content Hub to design and manage landing pages, forms, and customer portals for clients within their sub-accounts.
- Ensure content is optimized for user engagement and lead conversion specific to each client's needs.

5) Automation:
- Set up and manage feedback surveys within client sub-accounts to collect customer insights and satisfaction data.
- Build and deploy workflows based on established templates and frameworks to streamline operations within client sub-accounts.
- Create sequences that automate repetitive tasks, improving overall efficiency for each client's operations.

6) Help Desk Setup:
- Establish a help desk from scratch within client sub-accounts, including the configuration of inboxes and workflows for efficient customer support.
- Ensure the help desk is fully integrated with other systems and workflows for seamless operation in client sub-accounts.

7) Integrations:
- Integrate HubSpot with various third-party apps like Aircall and Xero within client sub-accounts to enhance functionality.
- Manage and maintain these integrations to ensure they operate smoothly and effectively for clients.

8) Strategic Optimization:
- Conduct thorough evaluations of client HubSpot sub-accounts to recommend improvements and optimize performance.
- Proactively interrogate processes within client accounts to identify opportunities for increasing productivity through platform utilization.

Desirable Qualifications and Skills Required:

1) Technical Proficiency:
- Extensive experience with HubSpot, including CRM setup, marketing automation, and content management within client sub-accounts.
- Strong understanding of integrations with platforms like Xero and Aircall, ensuring seamless data flow and system synergy for clients.
2) Analytical Skills:
- Ability to create, interpret, and update dashboards and reports within client sub-accounts to provide actionable insights.
- Skilled in data cleaning and management to maintain accurate and useful records in client pipelines and contacts.
3) Marketing Expertise:
- Proficient in utilizing HubSpot’s Marketing Hub Plus for campaign management and lead nurturing within client sub-accounts.
- Experienced in setting up email workflows and creating forms for effective lead capture in client accounts.
4) Automation and Workflow Management:
- Strong background in setting up complex workflows and automations to streamline business processes within client sub-accounts.
- Capable of building sequences that eliminate repetitive tasks and improve efficiency for clients.
5) Problem-Solving and Initiative:
- Demonstrated ability to identify and solve issues within HubSpot sub-accounts and related integrations for clients.
- Proactive in making recommendations and seeking out opportunities for platform enhancements in client accounts.
6) Communication and Collaboration:
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, for effective collaboration with TFM Digital team members and clients.
- Able to work closely with different departments, understanding client needs and translating them into HubSpot solutions.
7) Project Management:
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously within client sub-accounts, ensuring timely completion and adherence to quality standards.
- Experience in setting up and maintaining help desks, managing workflows, and ensuring smooth operations within client accounts.

Software to be used:
- HubSpot
- Xero
- Google Suite
