* Schedule regular posts using social media management tools. (Consider using Sprout Social as our posting frequency increases.)
* Engagement and Interaction:
* Monitor social media channels for mentions, comments, and direct messages.
* Engage with followers by responding promptly and participating in industry discussions.
4. Email Marketing:
* Campaign Development:
* Design and execute email marketing campaigns using Zoho Campaigns.
* Leverage existing personas and messaging angles in content.
* Segment email lists to target specific audiences based on demographics, behavior, and lead status.
* Content Creation:
* Write compelling email copy and design visually appealing templates.
5. Marketing Campaign Reporting:
* Performance Tracking and Reporting:
* Monitor KPIs such as open rates, click-through rates, conversion rates, and social media engagement.
* Use Zoho Campaigns and Zoho CRM analytics to prepare regular reports for the marketing and sales teams to review campaign effectiveness and ROI.
6. Lead Sourcing and Management:
* Lead Generation:
* Conduct research to identify and source potential leads through ZoomInfo, online research, industry events, and social media platforms.
* Use Zoho CRM to import and manage lead data.
* Share leads with sales representatives for follow-up.

Requirements:
* Proven experience in social media marketing and ad creation.
* Proficiency in using Canva for content creation.
* Experience with social media management tools (Sprout Social or similar).
* Strong understanding of email marketing best practices and experience with Zoho Campaigns.
* Familiarity with Zoho CRM for lead management and analytics.
* Excellent communication and engagement skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks efficiently.

Preferred Qualifications:
* Experience with landing page development and marketing automations.
* Prior experience in lead generation and management.
* Strong analytical skills for performance tracking and reporting.

How to Apply:
If you are interested in this position and meet the above requirements, please submit your resume and a portfolio of your recent work to us. Include any relevant project links and a brief explanation of your role in each project.

title: Join Our Dynamic Team as a Web Developer!
description:
Join Our Dynamic Team as a Web Developer!

Are you passionate about coding and ready to take your skills to the next level? We're an Australian company looking for a talented and dedicated Web Developer to join our team. This is a long-term opportunity to work on exciting projects, including maintaining and enhancing our internal CRM system built on the CodeIgniter framework, as well as developing innovative web-based software and websites.

What You’ll Do:
Maintain and improve our existing CRM system, ensuring seamless performance and quality.
Develop new software solutions that align with our business needs.
Tackle web design challenges, ensuring browser and cross-platform compatibility.

What We’re Looking For:
Strong PHP Skills: Proficient in both plain PHP and CodeIgniter.
Database Management: Experience with MySQL.
Front-End Mastery: Skilled in JavaScript, Ajax, and advanced HTML.
API Expertise: Able to develop and work with APIs, including reading and understanding API documentation.
Attention to Detail: Ability to deliver high-quality work with a focus on detail and efficiency.

Nice to Have:
Experience in database design and structure.
Knowledge of responsive CSS for mobile-friendly designs.

Why Join Us?

Work from Home: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely from Monday to Friday, 7 AM - 3 PM.
Career Growth: We value your development and offer opportunities to learn and grow.
Supportive Environment: Be part of a collaborative and innovative team that values your contributions.
Flexibility: Willingness to work on weekends for urgent tasks shows your dedication, and we recognize that.

If you're ready to make an impact and be a key player in our success, we'd love to hear from you!

title: [Media Buyer] Media Buying Coordinator (Full-time, Remote, US)
description:
We seek a Media Buying Coordinator to join our dynamic team. This role focuses on inventory management, advanced Excel tasks, and supporting media buying processes. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented and capable of thriving in a fast-paced, team-focused environment.

Key Responsibilities
Execute the procedural elements of media buying and scheduling, particularly in audio media such as podcasts and radio, to support the media team.
Collaborate with various teams to ensure smooth operations, including strategy, finance, analytics, and media partners.

title: Executive Assistant - Remote
description:
Penji is looking for an Executive Assistant on our Partner Success Team!

title: Process Engineer
description:
Mintleads is a B2B Lead generation service in the United States. We are looking for a full-time contracted Process Engineer in the Philippines that can assist our United States and Philippines teams. As a Process Engineer, you will work alongside the Director of Operations and be responsible for streamlining the core business processes for customer fulfillment.

The candidate should be comfortable multitasking and working cross-functionally with different business units.

Responsibilities
- Troubleshoot and improve performance on our current dashboarding system (Google Sheets)
- Automate and improve workflows in Google Sheets
- Generate automatic reports on key operations processes (Google Sheets + Zapier)
- Write python scripts to automate workflows using the APIs of our current tech stack - Google Sheets, Instantly.ai, Apollo.io, Million Verifier

Qualifications
- Proficient or expert in written and spoken English
- Experience with advanced Excel formulas (Importrange, Array formulas, and Query, along with basics like vlookup)
- University Degree in Marketing, Finance, Engineering, or related Field
- 2+ year professional experience in operations, consulting, or similar
- Proficiency with Python
- Proficiency with Microsoft Office and G-Suite, specifically Excel and Google Sheets
- A creative, analytical person who can identify anomalies in data and takes action appropriately to ensure a best-in-class experience for either our client, future clients, or internal team, depending on the project and data set
- Self-starter eager to drive their own change
- Hunger for more responsibilities in a fast-paced work environment
- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate with other business units


Salary Transparency
We are looking to hire an individual starting at $7 USD/hour. The position is 40 hours per week and is considered full-time.

We will not be offering benefits/healthcare since this is a contracted position.

About MintLeads
MintLeads is a growth marketing agency serving nearly 150+ B2B companies around the world, ranging from entrepreneurs to publicly traded companies.

We help businesses generate outbound sales leads with multi-channel prospecting systems.

You will be joining MintLeads at an inflection point in our company’s growth. We have tripled in size in the last 12 months and expect similar growth over the next 12 months.

This makes MintLeads the perfect home for growth-oriented individuals looking to advance their careers and see their work impact bottom-line results.

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips.

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:
EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing
We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing
We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.
You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)
You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform
You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.
*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*
If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:
Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement with your new employer, you get to meet her in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.
Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process!


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $400 USD a month ($4800 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification

title: Data and Reporting Operations Manager
description:
Company Overview:
MintLeads is a top-tier lead generation company specializing in email marketing. We focus on delivering results through strategic insights and efficient data management. Join us to play a crucial role in enhancing our data accuracy and reporting capabilities.

Role Overview:
The Data and Reporting Operations Manager will oversee data management and reporting processes, ensuring the accuracy and timeliness of campaign data. This role is crucial for maintaining the integrity of our data systems and providing actionable insights to drive campaign success.

Additional Items:
- Remote during EST work hours
- There will be an extensive 14-25 day training period

Key Responsibilities:
Data and Reporting Management:
- Perform night shift updates on the campaign dashboard, ensuring all data is current and accurate. This includes using formulas for data integrity.
- Monitor and update warm leads and booked calls in the campaign dashboard.
- Ensure alignment with central inboxes, maintaining data accuracy with less than 24-hour delay.
- Generate and manage client-facing reports based on the campaign dashboard, ensuring clarity and comprehensiveness.

Blacklist Management:
- Oversee the execution of automations and manual updates related to blacklisting.
- Scrub and remove invalid or problematic data entries from the system, ensuring data quality and reliability.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in data management, reporting, or related roles, ideally in a lead generation or email marketing context.
- Strong proficiency in using data tools and reporting systems, including experience with campaign dashboards and data formulas.
- Excellent attention to detail with a commitment to data accuracy and timeliness.
- Ability to handle data scrubbing and blacklist management effectively, identifying and addressing data issues.
- Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with data automation tools and processes.
- Familiarity with client-facing reporting and data visualization.
- Experience working with central inbox systems and managing data delays.

title: Lead Generator (Social Media Scraping & Outreach)
description:

title: Website Content Writer + SEO Writer/Researcher
description:
About Us:
At Flow IO, we specialize in transforming businesses worldwide through cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions. Our expertise spans business automation, website development, and customized software solutions, all designed to streamline processes, integrate AI, and enhance efficiency. We are dedicated to creating and redesigning websites that are not only visually engaging but also user-friendly and optimized for performance. Join us on a journey to elevate your business with state-of-the-art web solutions and automation services that set you apart in the global marketplace.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Website Content Writer + SEO Writer/Researcher to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating engaging and high-quality content for websites while optimizing it for search engines. This role requires a deep understanding of SEO best practices, keyword research, and the ability to produce content that drives traffic and enhances user experience.

Key Responsibilities:

• Create compelling, well-researched, and SEO-optimized content for our website, including blogs, landing pages, product descriptions, and other web pages.
• Conduct thorough keyword research to identify high-value keywords and integrate them effectively into content.
• Develop and maintain a content calendar aligned with SEO strategies and business goals.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to create content that supports overall marketing objectives.
• Monitor and analyze website content performance using SEO tools and analytics, and adjust strategies as needed.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, algorithm changes, and best practices in SEO and content writing.

Qualifications:

• Proven experience as a Website Content Writer or similar role.
• Strong knowledge of SEO principles and best practices.
• Proficiency in keyword research tools (e.g., Google Keyword Planner, SEMrush, Ahrefs).
• Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail.
• Ability to create content that is both user-friendly and optimized for search engines.
• Familiarity with content management systems (e.g., WordPress) and basic HTML/CSS is a plus.
• Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) to track and improve content performance.
• Familiarity with content strategy and the ability to develop content that aligns with broader business goals.
• Basic understanding of on-page and off-page SEO techniques.
• Experience in creating content for various industries or niches.

Why Join Us?

• Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team.
• Work with flexible hours, professional development opportunities and more.

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about creating high-quality content and have a solid understanding of SEO, we would love to hear from you! Please send your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your work here

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Hiring Former US Banking or US Phone-Service Customer Service Reps
description:
Our Ideal Candidate: 

* We're looking for personnel with experience working with big bank or big phone company support teams. This includes companies like Jp Morgan, T-Mobile, Wells Fargo, Verizon, AT&T etc.

Someone with a lot of experience handling/managing incoming support requests, high-volume of requests and can still stay organized while accurately and best serving customers. 

////

What Is The Job: 

We run a Holiday lighting company that services high-end customers who wish to have Christmas lighting professionally installed in their homes. 

We receive a high volume of requests, mostly inbound requests, and the job entails reaching out to these potential customers quickly, accurately, and friendly. 

Each interaction with a customer will involve: 

1. Greet customer and gather general information about their goals
2. Try to answer questions and then try to qualify them based on various criteria
3. Put together digital quotes for the customer and give either exact, or ballpark pricing on a case by case basis
4. Determine whether the potential client is serious or not, and book in-person appointments for a sale person 
5. Follow-up with customers to try and close them on their projects
6. General CRM management. Involving updating CRM data, taking notes on clients, following up with leads until we sell or book an appointment, confirming in-person appointments, etc. 

Training for all of these tasks will be provided. 

This is a very fast paced job that gets extremely busy during November. Please do not apply if you do not think that you can handle high-volume of work, and some stress. 

////

Requirements: 

You're going to be dealing with high-end customers that require attention to detail, professionalism, and consistency. 

These are the skills/attributes that are required to be considered for this job. 

1. Excellent verbal and written American English. 

This includes being able to communicate clearly with excellent enunciation, not slurring words, and understanding some level of American idioms and colloquialisms. 

2. Very detail oriented and organized

You will be handling anywhere from 25-30 customers per day. Including phone calls, text messages, CRM updates, preparing quotes, following up with leads. If you are not detail oriented and organized, you will mess up and will not enjoy working this job. 

3. High work-ethic and honesty

This is a seasonal business that allows us very little time for mistakes. We really need someone in our corner that we can trust to show up, do a good job, and be honest. 

Mistakes happen, especially in a rush. We don't care. We expect our team members to be honest about mistakes, and forthcoming so that we can work together to solve them quickly, instead of hiding from mistakes and allowing them to grow in magnitude. 

4. Ability to work US Hours. 8am-4pm (sometimes working until 6pm with extra pay)

////

All in all, this position is not for a new, unexperienced BPO worker. But if you are someone who is ambitious, hard working, and want a position that can reward you as well as give you new levels of sales skills for the future, this is the job for you. 

////

Compensation 

Base pay is 45,000 PHP/mo paid bi-weekly for 40 hours per week. 

There will be many opportunities for overtime, weekend work, and more. 

Also, for every candidate that's selected and remains with us throughout the season, we give every team member a 100% paid week vacation for Christmas to enjoy time with family after a hard season of work. 

We don't have much time and we are hiring VERY QUICKLY. Doing about 7-10 interviews per day. 

If you are interested, please don't wait. Send an email to jobs@onetakemarketing.com with the subject line : "Christmas Appointment Setter". The challenge is real, but so are the rewards. Prove you can hang with our pace, and the opportunities are limitless.

Emmanuel Sayan

title: .NET Developer
description:
Overall purpose:
The .NET developer is responsible for designing, building and maintaining the
Middleware and Back-End solutions of the KeepFlying platform using Microsoft’s
.NET Framework (.NET 6/7/8/Core). They are responsible for understanding
business requirements, translating them into technical specifications and leading the
coding, testing and deployment process.

Top three goals
1. Can write clean, testable, concise and readable .NET C# code
2. Can follow standard OOP design principles such as SOLID, TDD, DRY and
YAGNI to implement features that not only meet business requirements, but
are scalable and easy to maintain.
3. Has sufficient understanding of a multi-layered application architecture and
has capability to write features using a multitude of technologies such as
PostgreSQL, Azure Service Bus and Azure Function
Duties and Responsibilities:
Development Duties:
1. Coding: Develop high-quality source code to complete applications within
deadlines.
2. Code Reviews: Conduct code reviews, ensuring that coding standards and
best practices are adhered to.
3. Unit Testing: Write unit tests for all new code and existing codebase
modifications.
4. Deployment: Assist in the deployment process, helping to troubleshoot any
issues throughout the lifecycle of projects
5. Automation: Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous
deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
6. Technical Leadership: Mentor junior developers, conduct technical training
sessions, and help in hiring processes.
7. Requirements Analysis: Work with business analysts and stakeholders to
translate business requirements into technical specifications.

8. Agile Methodologies: Participate in Scrum meetings, including daily stand-
ups, sprint planning, and sprint reviews.

Classification: Confidential

General Duties:
1. Documentation: Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation, including
but not limited to code comments, READMEs, and technical manuals.
2. Reporting: Regularly update management and stakeholders on project
status, risks, and opportunities.
3. Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and
industry best practices to ensure that the company remains competitive.
4. Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with other departments like
QA, UX/UI, and Operations to ensure a harmonious development cycle.
Key Performance Indicators:
1. Code Quality: Maintain a code quality score of at least 'A' as measured by
code analysis tools like SonarQube.
2. Delivery Timeliness: 90% of development tasks delivered on or before the
deadline.

3. Bug Rate: Reduce or maintain a low rate of post-deployment critical and high-
severity bugs, aiming for less than 2% of total development hours.

4. Unit Test Coverage: Make at least 70% of their code, covered by unit tests.
5. Peer Reviews: Frequency and quality of peer reviews conducted for team
members' code. Should score at least 4/5 based on peer reviews.

Qualifications:
Must be educated to either degree level in Computer Science, or have sufficient
experience in lieu.

Experience:
At least 5 years development experience as a dotnet developer/architect.
Must have built a number of dotnet applications in wide scope of delivery platforms
(Desktop, Console, API etc.).
Have experience integrating with APIs over HTTP/REST.
Must be proficient with software design principles (SOLID, DRY, TDD, YAGNI etc)
and methodologies such as SCRUM, Agile etc.
Have built, tested and delivered applications throughout the entire SDLC, from
inception to delivery and on-going support.
Understand Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment strategies, with a
basic understanding to their benefit and purpose.
Have worked with database technologies outside of Entity Framework.


Skills:
Be proficient enough to write clean, readable, testable and maintainable dotnet code
without prompt.
Must be proficient in git. Being capable of maintaining a git repository, making
changes, reverting changes, branching, cherry picking etc.
Must be capable of working directly with a database provider such as pgSQL. Should
be capable of designing a table structure with appropriate use of column data-types,
indexes, foreign keys and constraints.
Have experience working with dotnet IDE’s such as Visual Studio or Jetbrains Rider.
Have an understanding of nuget and its capabilities
Can write both unit and integration tests in xUnit with an understanding of the
difference between those types of tests.
Have experience working with Swagger, in both the definition and consumption of
swagger documentation.
Be comfortable translating detailed business requirements into a Domain Model and
integrating that Domain Model into the functional and technical requirements of a
development.
Personal Qualities:
Can use clear and unambiguous language to describe complex technical processes.
Open for constructive criticism and guidance by their peers. Able to provide
constructive criticism of code written by their peers.
Actively seeks to improve their own skill sets by reading or writing technical blogs,
contributing to Open-Source software and keeps up to date on the latest dotnet
technology and improvements.
Can seek self-assistance by using a multitude of online sources to problem-solve.
Capable of taking abstract principles or concepts and adjusting them to fit a specific
problem or solution they are working on to get the job done.
A good communicator, that likes to talk to others in the team about their failures and
successes to help advance both theirs and others understandings of the
development life-cycle.

Interested applicants can send your CV at : jace@axpara.com?Subject : FULL NAME | .NET DEVELOPER

title: Webflow Web Designer & Developer
description:
As a Web Designer & Developer for Webflow, your main responsibilities will be creating and managing websites. We have a rapidly growing business and are developing more within our home improvement service. All of these require skilled writing to maintain and grow.

- Collaborate with the team to design Low-Fi and High-Fi prototypes for GorbMedia clients.

- Alt text for images
- Page speed optimization

- Collaborate with the SEO team to identify and resolve technical SEO issues.

### **Communication and Collaboration:**

- Ensure timely delivery of high-quality work and adherence to project deadlines.
- Assist in managing and executing various micro-projects as needed.

## Characteristics & Qualifications:

- Webflow

- Has a blend of technical expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills to ensure our client's websites perform at their best & tools to support our internal teams.

installation of pixel and tracking for google, meta, reddit, Quora, TikTok , google tags,
set up of advertising accounts
operate of Wordpress plugins, popups, email capture apps (mailchimp)
upload and schedule posts and release
communicate with content writers, management, video team to coordinate web posts and related activities.
in touch with the latest website optimisation practices - especially on mobile
reporting weekly results
data management - store for easy retrieval
maintenance of data and google sheets, 
automation flows
set up AI tools
create and maintain retargeting lists, pixels, conversion event

working hours - Monday to Friday - 9am to 6pm. we observe philippines holidays

FOR ALL APPLICANTS (all applications without this will not be considered)
in less than 300 words, describe the common practices for advertisements in google and meta. you may also include the technical setup, common Wordpress plugins. also you can describe the main challenges you have faced when working with the team.

Please include the following in your application:
• A link to your resume.
• Your WhatsApp number.
• OLJ profile link
• A portfolio of your previous work.
• Links to your social media accounts.
• An explanation of how you consistently stay up-to-date with trends.

please provide your WhatsApp contact number, email and we will reach out to you if you are shortlisted.

title: Ecommerce Account Analyst - Work From Home - Virtual Assistant
description:
KeyTiger, a US-based e-commerce business in the home décor/interior design industry, is seeking highly-motivated and competent individuals to join our remote team. If you have high attention-to-detail, possess excellent English communication skills, and are interested in a full time work from home / online position, apply now!

Position: Ecommerce Accounts Analyst - (20+ POSITIONS OPEN)
Work Schedule: 9AM-5PM Pacific Time, Mon-Fri
Salary: $400 to $1,000* monthly

Benefits include:
- Holidays: Paid US Public Holidays
- Paid Time Off: 11 accrued personal days off per year
- Growth: Bonus and salary increase depending on performance

Primary Responsibilities
1. Email handling and phone handling
2. Managing sales channels and submitting orders
3. Tracking sales metrics and online feedback
4. Compiling data and preparing sales reports
5. Communicating with vendors and distributors

Requirements
1. Excellent spoken and written English skills
2. Stable, high-speed internet connection
3. Willingness to be trained and work with us long-term (must have no other job obligations)

*Published salary is for starting only. Multiple salary increases within a year are possible in order to match employee's skill level.

INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO APPLY
 
Email the requirements below to recruiting@keytiger.com:
1. The most recent copy of your resume (as a file attachment)
2. Your complete name and phone number
3. Your Skype ID

Note: Use the job title as the subject of your email, e.g. "Ecommerce Account Analyst".

IMPORTANT (You must reply to the email): You will receive an autoreply with a few questions immediately after sending your email application. If you don't get an autoreply within 1-2 minutes, check your spam/junk folder or message us at fb.com/KeyTigerRecruitmentPage.

Tell your friends about this job opening for a chance to receive a REFERRAL BONUS of $300! For more information, go to fb.com/KeyTigerRecruitmentPage/posts/3664062487153323.

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Job Description
We need a Marketing and Administrative Assistant and Administrative Assistant to help market and deliver our content and nurture our lead funnel as well as handle general business administrative tasks. 

Detailed Responsibilities

Your daily responsibilities would include:

Marketing Responsibilities 
Goal: Help bring in new investor leads & off market property owner leads

? Create & manage Marketing Content Calendar in partnership with our CEO
? Create marketing graphics in Canva (or another tool if you prefer) ex. social posts, ads, email banners, YouTube thumbnails, one-pagers, etc
? Post video content on social channels- i.e Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn
? Repurpose video content for other marketing channels
? Write and schedule social media posts on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn
? Write blog posts and adding to our Hubspot/Wordpress website
? Write marketing emails and send via HubSpot
? Promote lead magnets and marketing campaigns ex. ebooks, summits, webinars via all marketing channels
? Create and send calendar invitations for interviews with Zoom links
? Respond to comments and messages on social media channels

Administrative Responsibilities
Goal: Ensure our company’s customers have a top-notch experience as well as maintaining administrative task in various marketing funnels.

? Send Weekly Program Emails to Existing Investor Leads
? Create Zoom Meetings for live trainings
? Create and Send calendar invitations for live trainings with Zoom links
? Setup and buildout Exandi.io account for LinkedIn connections
? Update and Log all deal flow into our Property UW Log on Excel Online from our emails daily.
? Communicate with brokers via email or WhatsApp to establish certain metrics of properties that come in.
? Underwrite deals that meet our buying criteria using our proprietary underwriting software.

Required Technical Skills and experience

To qualify for this position, you will need at least 1 year of professional experience in:

- Digital Marketing
- HubSpot

While not required, we will heavily favor candidates who also have experience in:

- Marketing Automation
- Sales Funnel Building

Soft skills

The perfect fit for our team would already embody our D3 Capital Core Values:
1. Never Boring - We have fun with our work and are energized by the possibilities of each new and different project. 
2. Always Serving - We are constantly looking to answer "How can I help?” for clients, partners, vendors, and team members. We take care of each other.
3. Business-Minded - We are results-driven - in our approach to client projects and in how we choose to spend our time each day.
4. Excellence - We produce industry-best, top tier work.
5. Positive - We hold ourselves to bringing a positive, can-do attitude to our work. We are a pleasure to do business with.
6. Transparent - We are open with investors and each other. We are never shady. 
7. Entrepreneurial - We constantly look for ways to solve problems for our customers, expand our products and services, and do better business.
8. Do the right thing. - We trust our guts. If we mess up, we own it. If we’re asked to do something that doesn’t feel right, we don’t do it.
9. Grateful - We take time to be thankful and celebrate our wins. 


Basic Skills

In addition to having excellent English skills, you’ll need to use the applications below. You don’t need to be an expert in all of them, but you need to be at least familiar with most of them.

We operate on Microsoft Suite:
Exchange
Exchange Calendar
One Drive
Microsoft Word
Microsoft Excel
Microsoft Powerpoint
Google Search Engine (for research)
Microsoft Teams

We use the Google Suite less often, but from time to time you will also use:
Google Docs
Google Sheets
Google Slides
Google Gmail

Communications Software:
Zoom Meetings
Slack
Loom

Social Media:
Post Scheduling Software (Metricool) OR Posting directly in Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter, , Tiktok, YouTube 
Facebook Groups


Time Tracking:
Connect Team

Graphic Design:
Canva
OR any other graphic design suite such as Adobe

Video Editing
Adobe
Descript
Opus

Marketing Automation:
Hubspot
Metricool



Work Schedule and Holidays

This is a part-time position. 
Work as it fits your schedule.

Your first 30 days of employment will be considered a trial period. 

You qualify for 4 paid vacation days and 2 paid sick days during the first 6 months. 

After 6 months, you qualify for 2 weeks of paid vacation days plus 3 paid sick days per calendar year.

We honor most Filipino holidays except for All Saints and All Souls Day.

Salary

$500 USD / Month (About $10 USD / Hr)

Perks and Benefits

Once you complete 6 months of work, you will receive a $500 USD bonus.

Career Potential

You’ll be working directly with the CEO. As our business grows, you will have the opportunity to take on more responsibility, and as you add more value to the team, you will also earn raises.
Details on How to Apply

When applying, 

1. Put “D3 Enterprises!” in the subject line. 
2. Attach your resume.
3. Let us know what excited you most about our job posting and why you feel you would be a great fit.
4. Provide examples of relevant work.

title: Facebook Group Manager
description:
Find My Place, a leading student housing listing service, is looking for a dedicated and reliable Virtual Assistant to manage our Facebook housing groups. We own and operate multiple Facebook groups in various locations, and we need someone to help maintain the integrity and engagement of these communities.

Your primary responsibility will be to admit or deny new members into our groups, ensure community guidelines are followed, and member requests are responded to.

Key Responsibilities:
- Approve or deny new member requests based on predefined criteria.
- Monitor and remove spam content to ensure a safe and welcoming environment.
- Post content provided by our team and engage with members by responding to comments and messages.
- Approve or decline member posts, ensuring they adhere to group rules and guidelines.
- Enforce group rules and handle any violations in a professional manner.
- Interact with group members, answering questions, and facilitating discussions where appropriate (you will be trained on this as needed).
- Regularly report on group activity, growth, and any issues to the Find My Place team.

Requirements:
- A reputable and established Facebook profile with a good profile image.
- Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Previous experience in Facebook group management or community moderation is a plus.
- Attention to detail and the ability to make sound judgments about member approvals and post content.
- Reliable internet connection and the ability to check in on groups regularly throughout the day.
- Trustworthy and capable of managing sensitive group admin tasks.

Why Join Us?
- Be part of a growing company dedicated to helping students find the perfect housing.
- Flexible working hours that fit around your schedule.
- Opportunity to be part of an engaging and positive online community.

If you’re a proactive individual with a keen eye for detail and a passion for maintaining online communities, we’d love to hear from you!

How to Apply: Please submit your resume, along with a link to your Facebook profile, and a brief cover letter explaining your experience with Facebook group management and why you would be a good fit for this role.

Hours:
6 hours a week (time can range depending on the level of member participation in the groups)

Wage:
The first month will be a trial month, at $3.00 USD/hr ($72 USD/mo). If it is still a good fit and I feel you are a worthwhile candidate to continue working with, the wage will increase to $4.00 USD/hr ($96 USD/mo), and can continue upward as trust and output increase.

HOW TO RESPOND:
1. Please submit your resume, along with a link to your Facebook profile, and a brief cover letter explaining your experience with Facebook group management and why you would be a good fit for this role.
2. Include the word “mango” in your response. Why? This lets us see who is actually paying attention.

title: Immediate Hiring: Healthcare Specialist Customer Support (Full-Time, Work From Home)
description:
Hey there! Are you ready to join something amazing in the healthcare field? If you love physical therapy, diet, and nutrition, we have an awesome opportunity for you to join our team as a Health Care Specialist in Customer Support!

We are looking for a dedicated and compassionate Health Care Specialist to join our team. As a Health Care Specialist, your role is crucial in providing support and guidance to our valued customers. You'll ensure their needs are met with patience, empathy, and accurate information.

As a valued member of our team, you will play a key role in evaluating our healthcare programs, developing innovative educational initiatives, and ensuring the delivery of top-notch services to our valued customers. Your friendly and approachable demeanor will be instrumental in building positive relationships with our customers, ensuring their satisfaction and well-being.

#

Who are we?

We are RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., and we've been around since 1999. We're always growing our team, and we've had the pleasure of offering sustainable employment opportunities to many virtual assistants over the years. Our main virtual assistant has been with us for over a decade, which really shows how we value long-term relationships. Right now, we have a team of over 90 full-time virtual assistants who are all dedicated to what they do.

We're on the lookout for someone who's independent, resourceful, and able to problem-solve. You'll need to be adaptable and open to new ideas, as well as someone who can work without constant supervision.

This job requires flexibility in terms of working hours, and you'll need to be open to working om rotational shifts. We use a time-tracking tool called Hubstaff to ensure accountability and productivity. This tool lets us monitor your working hours, capture your computer screen during work, measure your productivity, and keep track of the websites you visit while on duty.

#

What is it like working with us?

At RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., we believe in progress and constant development. You won't be doing the same old thing day in and day out for years on end. We will give you a chance to try new things and expand your horizons, which will benefit both you and the company.

Additionally, we place a high premium on fairness, honesty, and integrity in the workplace. We foster an environment where everyone is encouraged to speak up and share their ideas for growth and improvement.

#

Skills and Requirements:
- Degree in Medicine, Medical Science, Nursing, Physical Therapy/Physiotherapy, or equivalent.
- Minimum of two years of relevant experience as a Health Care Specialist.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
- Effective verbal and written communication skills in English, with attention to grammar.
- Tech-savvy with a reliable working PC, stable internet connection, and noise-canceling headset.
- Punctuality and commitment to maintaining a consistent attendance record.
- Positive working attitude and ability to maintain professionalism at all times.
- Strong work ethic, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to maintain the confidentiality of critical information.
- Teamwork and collaboration skills.
- Ability to ensure brand consistency and accuracy in all tasks.
- Comfortable working with a time-tracking tool to manage work hours effectively.

#

Duties and Responsibilities:
- Respond to inquiries, concerns, and requests from customers regarding healthcare services and products.
- Address and resolve customer complaints or issues, ensuring a satisfactory resolution.
- Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions and follow-up actions taken.
- Collaborate with healthcare professionals and internal teams to ensure a seamless and positive customer experience.
- Continuously improve customer support processes and contribute to enhancing the overall customer experience.
- Provide guidance and educational resources to customers, helping them make informed decisions about their healthcare.
- Develop written procedures for the company's current processes and procedures.

#

How to apply for this position?

To apply, simply send an email to hiringmanager@ExercisesForInjuries.net .

Use this subject line: Full-Time Health Care Specialist Customer Support (Work From Home) - Application

To ensure a comprehensive review of your application, please provide the following information:

1.) Attached Resume: Please attach a clear and updated copy of your resume. Ensure that it includes your recent photo.

2.) Character References: Please provide the names, contact numbers, and email addresses of three character references who can speak to your professional skills and work ethic.

3.) Onlinejobs.ph Account: Please provide the link to your Onlinejobs.ph account.

4.) Employment Status: Are you currently employed? Please let us know your current employment status.

5.) Interview Availability: Are you available to be interviewed at any time? Please inform us of your availability for interviews.

6.) Salary Expectation: Please state your salary expectation for this position.

7.) Certifications: If you hold any certifications or credentials relevant to the healthcare field, please provide a link to them for our review.

Note that we only accept applications through email, and we appreciate your adherence to these instructions.

We look forward to reviewing your application thoroughly and potentially having the opportunity to connect with you. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.

Best regards,

~ EFI Hiring Manager

title: Zoho Crm Expert
description:
We are looking for a skilled CRM Expert who specializes in Zoho to help us streamline our lead management process. The ideal candidate will be responsible for integrating our website contact forms with Zoho CRM, allowing us to categorize and better understand our leads. Your role will involve designing, implementing, and optimizing the CRM workflow to improve our sales funnel and conversion rates.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Integrate existing website contact forms into Zoho CRM.
- Customize Zoho CRM to categorize leads based on user selections from forms.
- Develop workflows and automation to optimize lead management.
- Analyze and report on lead data to provide insights into customer behavior.
- Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to align CRM processes with business goals.
- Provide training and support to staff on Zoho CRM best practices.

**Qualifications:**

- Proven experience with Zoho CRM, including setup, customization, and integration.
- Strong understanding of lead management processes and CRM best practices.
- Experience with web form integration and data mapping.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with API integration and custom coding within Zoho.
- Background in sales, marketing, or customer relationship management.

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience with Zoho CRM and how you can help us improve our lead management process.

Please do not apply if you have no experience.

title: Active Campaign Expert
description:
We are a dynamic marketing agency specializing in promoting and scaling info products. Our team is passionate about delivering high-quality marketing solutions that drive results for our clients. We are looking for a talented ActiveCampaign Expert to join our team and help us streamline and optimize our email marketing efforts.

As an ActiveCampaign Expert, you will play a crucial role in executing, optimizing, and managing email marketing campaigns for our info product clients. You will be responsible for leveraging ActiveCampaign's powerful features to build and maintain effective marketing automation, ensure high deliverability, and keep our email lists clean and engaged. You will work closely with our dedicated copywriter to create compelling email content that resonates with our target audience.

Key Responsibilities:

Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and monitor email marketing campaigns using ActiveCampaign. Ensure campaigns are delivered on time, with high-quality content and targeting.

Automation Building: Develop and implement advanced email automation workflows to nurture leads, engage customers, and drive conversions. Optimize existing automations for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.

Integrations: Manage and troubleshoot integrations between ActiveCampaign and other platforms/tools (e.g., CRMs, landing page builders, e-commerce platforms) to ensure seamless data flow and functionality.

List Management and Cleaning: Regularly maintain and update email lists, ensuring they are clean, segmented, and optimized for engagement. Implement strategies to reduce bounce rates and maintain high deliverability.

Deliverability Maintenance: Monitor email deliverability rates, identify potential issues, and implement best practices to improve inbox placement and reduce the risk of emails being marked as spam.

Performance Analysis: Analyze campaign performance metrics, generate reports, and provide insights to optimize future campaigns. Use A/B testing to refine email strategies and improve open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.

Collaboration: Work closely with the copywriter and other team members to ensure email content aligns with marketing goals and resonates with the target audience.

Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience working with ActiveCampaign in a similar role.
Strong knowledge of email marketing best practices, including deliverability, list management, and automation.
Proven experience in building and optimizing email automation workflows.
Familiarity with integrating ActiveCampaign with other marketing tools and platforms.
Excellent analytical skills to interpret campaign performance data and implement improvements.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Proactive problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot issues effectively.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively within a team.

title: Executive Assistant (with Web Design Background)
description:
**Please read experience requirement carefully**

Create and Boom
https://createandboom.com/
Type of Employment: Full Time
Salary Range: AUD$6ph - AUD$10ph
Department: Management

Company Overview:
Create and Boom is a forward-thinking company dedicated to delivering innovative marketing solutions that drive client success. We are passionate about our work and committed to fostering a collaborative, inclusive, and dynamic work environment. Our team is a close-knit group of smart and passionate individuals who believe in the transformative power of our services. Position Overview:

This role is crucial for ensuring smooth operations and enabling the team to focus on strategic initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess strong organisational skills, a high level of communication proficiency, and the ability to manage various administrative tasks remotely. You will play a pivotal role in maintaining the efficiency of our operations while fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Executive Support:
• Manage calendars, schedule meetings, and coordinate travel arrangements for the leadership team.
• Handle email and direct messaging on behalf of executives, ensuring clear and timely communication with clients, stakeholders, and internal teams.
• Prepare and organise documents for meetings, including presentations, reports, and other necessary materials.
• Act as a liaison between executives and clients, maintaining a high level of professionalism and confidentiality
2. Project Management:
• Assist in the planning, execution, and tracking of company projects, ensuring deadlines are met and objectives are achieved.
• Collaborate with various teams to streamline processes and improve efficiency in project execution.
• Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to the leadership team.
3. Hiring and Recruitment:
• Manage the recruitment process for future employees, including sourcing, qualifying candidates, and organising interviews.
• Coordinate interview meetings with Daniel and other relevant team members to approve candidates and facilitate the hiring process.
• Onboard new hires into Create and Boom’s systems, including Notion, Hubspot, communication platforms, Dropbox, and any other operational tools relevant to their position.
• Ensure a smooth onboarding experience, providing new employees with the necessary resources, training, and support to integrate into the team and company culture.
4. Administrative Tasks:
• Organise and maintain company records, ensuring all documentation is up to date and accessible.
• Manage expenses and assist with financial reporting as required.
• Perform general administrative tasks such as drafting emails, managing databases, and handling office communications.
• Coordinate with external vendors and service providers as needed.
5. Communication & Collaboration:
• Facilitate effective communication across the team, ensuring that all members are informed and aligned on company goals and initiatives.
• Participate in team meetings, providing administrative support and capturing key action items.
• Foster a positive team environment by assisting with team-building activities and internal communications.
6. Basic Design and Creative Tasks:
• Utilise basic design skills to create visually appealing materials using Canva, including presentations, social media content, and internal documents.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure that all creative outputs align with the company’s branding and visual identity.
• Assist in the design and formatting of documents and presentations for internal and client-facing use.
7. Special Projects:
• Take on special projects as assigned by the leadership team, demonstrating flexibility and initiative.
• Assist in the development and implementation of new processes and systems to improve company operations.
Measurable Outcomes:
• Maintain a 90% or higher success rate in scheduling and coordinating meetings and travel arrangements without conflicts.
• Successfully manage and complete at least three significant projects within the first six months.
• Ensure timely and accurate communication between executives and clients, leading to improved client satisfaction.
• Implement at least two new organisational processes that enhance efficiency within the first six months.
• Successfully onboard new hires, ensuring they are fully integrated into Create and Boom’s systems and operations within their first month.

Practical Requirements:
• Full-time availability with flexible working hours, aligned with Sydney office hours.
• A dedicated, quiet workspace conducive to remote work.
• A reliable, high-speed internet connection with a backup option for emergencies.

Experience Requirements:
• Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in an executive assistant or similar administrative role.
• Strong organisational and time-management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a native-quality understanding of Australian English.
• Proficiency in using office software (Apple Suite, Google Workspace) and project management tools.
• Basic design skills with experience using Canva.
• Experience with CRM and email marketing tools (e.g., Hubspot, Klaviyo) is beneficial.
• Familiarity with tools like Notion, Zapier, and AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT) is a plus.

Competencies:
• Warm, concise, and clear communication skills.
• Ability to consistently follow existing procedures while identifying areas for improvement.
• Empathy in understanding and tailoring communication to different stakeholders.
• Positive attitude with a strong sense of optimism and creativity.
• Adaptability in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.
• Proactive in suggesting and implementing process improvements.
• Receptive to feedback and committed to personal and professional growth.

Work Environment:
• Remote work with regular virtual meetings to discuss developments and objectives.
• Flexibility to respond to urgent requests outside of standard working hours, with additional compensation as agreed.

Application Process:
If you are interested in this role, please submit the following:
1. A 2-5 minute video introducing yourself and explaining why you are the best fit for this role and our team culture.
2. A copy of your resume or a link to your LinkedIn profile.
3. Contact details for two referees (one professional and one personal) who will be contacted after the first interview.
4. Submit your video and resume to aleana@purposeadvisory.com.au

title: Remote IT Systems Administrator / Cloud Solutions Specialist
description:
IF YOU HAVE NOT USED ZAPIER OR HAVE NOT ACTUALLY DONE CUSTOM SYSTEMS INTEGRATIONS FOR CRMS LIKE ASANA GOOGLE TRELLO HUBSPOT OR SLACK SUCCESSFULLY PREVIOUSLY PLEASE DO NOT APPLY.


Job Type: Project-Based (Potential for Ongoing Support)

Location: Remote

Company Overview:
We are a growing remote bookkeeping business that provides high-quality, secure, and efficient bookkeeping services to our clients. Our team operates in a cloud-based environment, utilizing tools such as HubSpot, Asana, Slack, Google Workspace, LastPass, Windows 365 Cloud PC, and QuickBooks Online. We are seeking an experienced Remote IT Systems Administrator/Cloud Solutions Specialist to streamline and automate our workflows, ensuring seamless integration between all systems.

Job Overview:
We are looking for a skilled IT professional to help us set up, integrate, and automate our cloud-based systems into a cohesive workflow. The ideal candidate will have experience with system integration, automation, and security in a remote work environment, preferably with a background in supporting small to medium-sized businesses. This project will involve configuring and connecting our existing tools to ensure smooth, efficient, and secure operations.

Key Responsibilities:
System Integration:
Set up and integrate HubSpot, Asana, Slack, Trello, Google Workspace, LastPass, Windows 365 Cloud PC, and QuickBooks Online.
Ensure seamless transitions between tools, creating a unified workflow for lead management, client onboarding, task management, communication, and bookkeeping.

Automation Setup:
Configure automation workflows using tools like Zapier or native integrations to minimize manual input and streamline processes.
Automate key business processes, such as task creation from CRM entries, notifications, document management, and recurring task management.

Security Configuration:
Ensure all systems are configured to protect sensitive client data, including setting up and managing LastPass for secure password storage and sharing.
Configure Windows 365 Cloud PCs to provide a secure working environment for remote bookkeepers.

Documentation and Training:
Provide clear, detailed documentation of all setups, integrations, and workflows.
Train team members on how to use the systems effectively and troubleshoot basic issues.

Ongoing Support (Optional):
Offer post-setup support to address any issues or make adjustments as needed.
Potential for ongoing work in system maintenance, upgrades, and further automation.

Must-Have Requirements:
Experience with Cloud-Based Tools:
Demonstrated experience in setting up and integrating tools like HubSpot, Asana, Slack, Google Workspace, LastPass, Windows 365 Cloud PC, and QuickBooks Online.
Ability to configure these tools to work together seamlessly for a remote team.

Automation Expertise:
Strong experience with automation tools such as Zapier or HubSpot Workflows.
Proven ability to create automated workflows that streamline business processes.

Technical Skills:
Strong understanding of IT systems, cloud computing, and cybersecurity best practices.
Ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to system integration and security.

Project Management Experience:
Experience in managing projects that involve multiple systems and stakeholders.
Ability to deliver projects on time and within budget, with clear communication throughout.

Strong Communication Skills:
Fluent in English with the ability to clearly document processes and train team members.
Excellent communication skills, with a focus on clarity and simplicity.

Remote Work Experience:
Previous experience working remotely, preferably with teams based in the Philippines or other regions.
Familiarity with the challenges and best practices of remote work, especially in a small business environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with Small to Medium-Sized Businesses:
Understanding of the unique challenges faced by small businesses, particularly in the bookkeeping or financial services industry.

Certifications:
Relevant certifications in cloud computing, IT security, or project management are a plus (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Certified Information Systems Security Professional - CISSP).

Compensation:
Project-Based Rate: Negotiable based on experience and scope of work.
Potential for Ongoing Support: Opportunity for ongoing work based on performance and business needs.

Application Process:
To apply, please submit your resume, a brief cover letter outlining your experience with the required tools, and examples of similar projects you have completed. Candidates who meet the qualifications will be contacted for an interview.

title: Marketing Automation Specialist
description:
About Us:
DAP Brands is a leading tax strategy company dedicated to helping businesses and individuals navigate the complexities of taxation with precision and expertise. We pride ourselves on delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service to our clients. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a talented Marketing Automation Specialist to join our team and drive our marketing efforts to the next level.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Marketing Automation Specialist to design, implement, and optimize automated marketing campaigns that drive engagement, generate leads, and increase conversions. In this role, you will leverage specialized software to automate repetitive marketing tasks, allowing DAP Brands to efficiently manage large-scale campaigns and personalize communications at scale.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Campaign Planning and Strategy:
- Develop and execute marketing automation strategies that align with DAP Brands’ overall marketing goals.
- Create targeted campaigns that effectively guide prospects through the marketing funnel.
2. Email Marketing:
- Design and manage various email marketing campaigns, including drip campaigns, newsletters, and transactional emails.
- Segment email lists to deliver personalized content to specific audience groups.
3. Workflow and Automation Setup:
- Build and maintain automated workflows and sequences that trigger actions based on user behavior (e.g., email sends, lead 
scoring, CRM updates).
- Utilize marketing automation platforms such as HubSpot, Marketo, or Pardot to create and manage these workflows.
4. Lead Nurturing and Scoring:
- Implement lead nurturing programs to engage prospects over time and move them closer to a purchasing decision.
- Establish lead scoring models to prioritize leads based on their interactions with DAP Brands’ marketing materials.
5. Data Management and Integration:
- Ensure accurate collection, storage, and integration of marketing data with other systems, such as CRM platforms.
- Use data-driven insights to refine targeting, improve campaign performance, and inform decision-making.
6. A/B Testing and Optimization:
- Conduct A/B tests on various campaign elements (e.g., subject lines, content, send times) to optimize performance.
- Analyze campaign metrics to identify areas for improvement and implement changes to enhance effectiveness.
7. Reporting and Analytics:
- Monitor the performance of marketing automation campaigns and report on key metrics (e.g., open rates, click-through rates, conversions, ROI).
- Provide insights and recommendations to improve future campaigns.
8. Collaboration:
- Work closely with content creators, designers, sales teams, and other marketing professionals to ensure cohesive and effective campaigns.
- Align marketing automation efforts with broader marketing and sales strategies.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Marketing Automation Specialist or in a similar role.
- Proficiency with marketing automation platforms (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot, GHL).
- Strong understanding of email marketing best practices and campaign management.
- Experience with lead nurturing, lead scoring, and CRM integration.
- Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

How to Apply:

Use the Job Code: AUTO

profits to nonprofit wildlife partners. Their goal is to educate and excite their customers about wildlife while supporting organizations that do the tracking and research. Join us and be part of a team that’s dedicated to making a meaningful impact!

Job Description:
Are you passionate about delivering exceptional customer service and reliability? We is seeking a dedicated Customer Service Associate to join our Customer Care Team for another record-breaking holiday season! Our Customer Care Team is the heart of our brand, building trust and loyalty through outstanding service. As a Customer Service Associate, you will thrive in a fast-paced environment, responding to customer requests across multiple channels and ensuring every customer interaction is positive and productive.

• Assist customers with a variety of issues, including returns, replacements, refunds, delivery status, discounts, and back orders.
• Aim to meet or exceed customer service targets and metrics.
• Handle customer complaints professionally, providing timely and appropriate solutions.
• Answer product-related questions and make recommendations to enhance customer satisfaction.
• Inform customers about current promotions and special sales.
• Provide information about company policies and procedures.
• Forward emails, messages, and tickets to the appropriate departments and escalate issues to the Customer Care Manager as needed.
• Stay up-to-date with current promotions, routines, and policy changes.
• Perform other ad hoc duties as assigned by the team.

Qualifications, Skills & Requirements:
• Associates Degree or equivalent.
• Minimum of 3 years experience in customer service, ideally in a call center surrounding or e-commerce.

• Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including spelling, grammar, and vocabulary.
• Knowledge of online etiquette and chat communication.
• Demonstrated patience, empathy, professionalism, and friendliness in customer interactions.

What You’ll Need:
• Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking.
• Proven track record of closing performance gaps and achieving targets.
• Excellent communication and relationship-building skills.
• Ability to provide relevant and immediate feedback in a dynamic and complex environment.
• Ability to troubleshoot and diagnose problems with limited direction.

Bonus Experience:

• Knowledge of Gorgias
• Knowledge of Slack

Schedules:
